MALAYSIA SHORTS

News aggregated and shorten to save your precious time!

  • BYD’S $18 BILLION ROUT SHOWS FALLOUT OF TESLA PRICE WAR IN CHINA

    https://finance.yahoo.com//news/byd-18-billion-rout-shows-041446545.html

    53.85% Shortened!

    (Bloomberg) -- A price war among electric vehicle makers in China is taking a toll on even the most resilient players, as evidenced by BYD Co.’s staggering $18 billion drop in the past month

    1, underperforming rival Tesla Inc

    to follow Tesla’s lead in lowering prices as demand slows

    “A gradual industry shift is underway as excessive price cuts can lead to buyers holding back, awaiting even lower prices, while also having an excessively negative impact on margin for all players,” said Robert Mumford, an investment manager at GAM Hong Kong Ltd

    “Lower input prices to date are not likely to offset a negative hit to margins.” Investors are now sifting through the pile of stocks to determine the likely winners and losers from the price war, Mumford added

    “Some players may have to undergo cash burn for market share gains and improved scale effect, which will lead to intensified competition and market consolidation,” Citigroup Inc

    ['bloomberg', 'price', 'byd', 'market', 'inc']

    (Bloomberg) -- A price war among electric vehicle makers in China is taking a toll on even the most resilient players, as evidenced by BYD Co.’s staggering $18 billion drop in the past month

    1, underperforming rival Tesla Inc

    to follow Tesla’s lead in lowering prices as demand slows

    “A gradual industry shift is underway as excessive price cuts can lead to buyers holding back, awaiting even lower prices, while also having an excessively negative impact on margin for all players,” said Robert Mumford, an investment manager at GAM Hong Kong Ltd

    “Lower input prices to date are not likely to offset a negative hit to margins.” Investors are now sifting through the pile of stocks to determine the likely winners and losers from the price war, Mumford added

    “Some players may have to undergo cash burn for market share gains and improved scale effect, which will lead to intensified competition and market consolidation,” Citigroup Inc

    ['bloomberg', 'price', 'byd', 'market', 'inc']

    03/06/2023, 14:23

    76.92% Shortened!

    Separately, he said Negri Sembilan police opened 2,833 investigation papers related to commercial crime last year involving losses amounting to RM62.5mil

    These were fraudulent online purchases, telecommunications fraud, non-existent loan and investment schemes, love scams, e-financial fraud, and the use of mule bank accounts by scammers

    He said the number of telecommunications fraud, non-existent investment schemes and e-financial fraud had registered an increase last year

    DCP Ahmad Dzaffir Mohd Yussof

  • FLOODS: WOMAN TRAUMATISED SEEING SON ALMOST SWEPT AWAY BY STRONG CURRENTS IN CHAAH

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2023/03/06/floods-woman-traumatised-seeing-son-almost-swept-away-by-strong-currents-in-chaah

    03/06/2023, 14:06

    72.73% Shortened!

    Balakrishnan, 44, showing the water level during the flood on March 1

    Kalaivani, 46, said that in the 5.30am incident, she woke up to find that the water in her home in Kampung Baru Chaah here had reached knee-level

    "My eldest son then told me that he was informed by his friend that floodwaters had started to rise in Pekan Chaah

    In the incident last Wednesday, Pekan Chaah and the surrounding area were cut off and turned into an island, making it inaccessible for the authorities to go in and rescue the flood victims

    It also killed two elderly people in Jalan Kongsai, Chaah, who were found by the authorities after the water receded, three days ago

    The Chaah police station fence was seen badly damaged and covered in debris

    ['kalaivani', 'water', 'flood', 'say', 'chaah']

  • PENANG ASSEMBLY VOTES TO VACATE FOUR SEATS, FORMER REPS TOLD TO LEAVE CHAMBER

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2023/03/06/penang-assembly-votes-to-vacate-four-seats-former-reps-told-to-leave-chamber

    03/06/2023, 14:06

    68.42% Shortened!

    Earlier, Penang Deputy Chief Minister I Datuk Ahmad Zakiyuddin Abdul Rahman said the decision made in the state assembly was in line with Article 14A(1) of the Penang State

    "If any question arises if a member of the state assembly has done so and a decision by the state assembly has been taken, it will be final," he said during the first day of the meeting held at the state assembly building in Light Street, George Town Penang on Monday (March 6)

    Ahmad Zakiyuddin (Pinang Tunggal) said based on the decision by the Federal Court, Penang's anti-party hopping enactment is constitutional

    "The Federal Court agreed that Article 14A of the Penang State Constitution is consistent with Article 10(1)(c) of the Federal Constitution

    On Thursday (March 2), the High Court dismissed the four assemblymen’s application for an injunction to prevent the Penang state assembly from tabling a motion to vacate the seats until their appeal is heard

    In 2020 the four assemblymen filed the suit to challenge the constitutionality of Article 14A(1) of the Penang State Constitution (PSC) and to stop their seats from being declared vacant, pursuant to Article 14A(1) but the Federal Court found that it was in line with the constitution

    ['state', 'assembly', 'vacate', 'penang', 'four']

    Earlier, Penang Deputy Chief Minister I Datuk Ahmad Zakiyuddin Abdul Rahman said the decision made in the state assembly was in line with Article 14A(1) of the Penang State

    "If any question arises if a member of the state assembly has done so and a decision by the state assembly has been taken, it will be final," he said during the first day of the meeting held at the state assembly building in Light Street, George Town Penang on Monday (March 6)

    Ahmad Zakiyuddin (Pinang Tunggal) said based on the decision by the Federal Court, Penang's anti-party hopping enactment is constitutional

    "The Federal Court agreed that Article 14A of the Penang State Constitution is consistent with Article 10(1)(c) of the Federal Constitution

    On Thursday (March 2), the High Court dismissed the four assemblymen’s application for an injunction to prevent the Penang state assembly from tabling a motion to vacate the seats until their appeal is heard

    In 2020 the four assemblymen filed the suit to challenge the constitutionality of Article 14A(1) of the Penang State Constitution (PSC) and to stop their seats from being declared vacant, pursuant to Article 14A(1) but the Federal Court found that it was in line with the constitution

    ['state', 'assembly', 'vacate', 'penang', 'four']

    03/06/2023, 14:05

    79.31% Shortened!

    The 16-year-old said she had met Brown on the dating app 3Fun

    — Image by Freepik A 16-year-old girl missing from her Indiana home for several months was being sex trafficked by a man she met on a dating app, US federal authorities say

    During an interview with investigators in November, the 16-year-old said she had met Brown on the dating app 3Fun

    From July to October, the 16-year-old had sex with about 45 men for money, she told authorities

    “You gotta do it, it’s US$2,000,” Brown told the girl, according to the complaint

    Then, she stole his car, US cops say Date turns violent when man is stabbed by woman he met on dating app, US cops say Trio of men forced woman to use dating app in home invasion-robbery scheme, US cops say Man she met on dating app drives woman into a river after dispute, US cops say

    83.33% Shortened!

    Ukrainian servicemen fire a 2S5 Giatsint-S self-propelled howitzer towards Russian troops outside the frontline town of Bakhmut, amid Russia's attack on Ukraine, in Donetsk region, Ukraine March 5, 2023

    For its part, the Russian Defence Ministry on Sunday said Russian forces had hit a command centre of the Ukrainian Azov Regiment in southeastern Zaporizhzhia region

    "If Wagner retreats from Bakhmut now, the whole front will collapse," Prigozhin said

    Volodymyr Nazarenko, a commander of Ukrainian troops in Bakhmut, said that there had been no order to retreat and "the defence is holding" in grim conditions

    "The situation in Bakhmut can be described as critical," Ukrainian military analyst Oleh Zhdanov said in a video commentary

    Russia's President Vladimir Putin ordered troops into Ukraine on a "special military operation" just over a year ago

    ['ukrainian', 'russian', 'bakhmut', 'russia', 'ukraine']

    03/06/2023, 11:06

    The government has earmarked US$140 billion that could include subsidising the purchase of domestically produced chipmaking equipment, Reuters reported in December, likely benefiting manufacturers such as China's sole semiconductor lithography specialist, Shanghai Micro Electronics Equipment Group (SMEE)

    SMEE did not respond to a request for comment

    SMEE has not made any major advancements since, in part due to difficulties in procuring equipment from abroad, the engineer told Reuters

    "Even if we could have built the machines, we wouldn't have known how to service and maintain them," the engineer said

    The situation could be worsened for Chinese companies should Japan and the Netherlands agree with the United States to also restrict exports of chipmaking equipment to China

    "When we bought our equipment, we used to get customer service

    ['china', 'chip', 'chinese', 'could', 'chipmaking']

  • 'I DON'T SEE MYSELF RETIRING AT ALL': 'SOFT SAVING' IS GEN Z'S FIRM BUT GENTLE RESPONSE TO FIRE AND HUSTLE CULTURE — HERE'S HOW TO MAKE IT WORK FOR YOU

    https://finance.yahoo.com//news/dont-see-myself-retiring-soft-130000368.html

    85.37% Shortened!

    She posts videos about managing your work-life balance and how she’s living her best “soft life” in notoriously expensive New York City

    Ladd is applying this mindset toward her money as well, and is “soft saving” — a trend that’s been gaining popularity among young Americans — instead of subscribing to hustle culture

    They’re choosing not to save their money as aggressively and to focus on the present

    “This is more about comfort, less stress, less pressure to save for the future and really balancing it out,” explains Brittney Castro, certified financial planner and consumer finance advocate at Intuit

    Ladd adds that you need to pick and choose what you want to spend your money on in order to make room for your financial goals

    “He lives a soft life,” she admits

    ['ladd', 'say', 'money', 'work', 'life']

  • CHINESE PLAAF CONDUCTS EARLY MORNING ‘RAID’ NEAR TAIWAN’S ADIZ; J-11 FLANKER USED TO TRACK FOREIGN AIRCRAFT OVER SCS

    https://eurasiantimes.com/chinese-plaaf-conduct-early-morning-raid-near-taiwans/

    03/06/2023, 11:05

    76.0% Shortened!

    10 PLA aircraft and 4 PLAN vessels around Taiwan were detected by 6 a.m.(UTC+8) today

    10 PLA aircraft and 4 PLAN vessels around Taiwan were detected by 6 a.m.(UTC+8) today

    🇹🇼 (@MoNDefense) March 6, 2023 Earlier, Chinese state media reportedly published footage of PLA Navy J-11 Flanker fighter jets tracking and monitoring foreign warplanes over the South China Sea on January 22

    Each Chinese aircraft was equipped with four air-to-air missiles.  In a statement published on WeChat, the PLA Southern Theater Command, on January 24, said that two Naval fighter jets under its command flew from Yongxing Island in the Xisha Islands to carry out surveillance of foreign aircraft over the South China Sea

    The state-run Global Times reported that the PLA aircraft often adjusted its flight attitude in response to the incoming foreign aircraft to ensure the target was within monitoring range and held the position until the foreign aircraft flew away

    While the Chinese report said that PLA Navy pilots were defending the security of their country’s air and sea, the US Indo-Pacific Command stated that their surveillance plane was legitimately carrying out routine operations over the South China Sea in international airspace

    ['chinese', 'pla', 'aircraft', 'air', 'china']

    10 PLA aircraft and 4 PLAN vessels around Taiwan were detected by 6 a.m.(UTC+8) today

    🇹🇼 (@MoNDefense) March 6, 2023 Earlier, Chinese state media reportedly published footage of PLA Navy J-11 Flanker fighter jets tracking and monitoring foreign warplanes over the South China Sea on January 22

    Each Chinese aircraft was equipped with four air-to-air missiles.  In a statement published on WeChat, the PLA Southern Theater Command, on January 24, said that two Naval fighter jets under its command flew from Yongxing Island in the Xisha Islands to carry out surveillance of foreign aircraft over the South China Sea

    The state-run Global Times reported that the PLA aircraft often adjusted its flight attitude in response to the incoming foreign aircraft to ensure the target was within monitoring range and held the position until the foreign aircraft flew away

    The Prime Minister said that in the current situation, the increase in the salary scheme could not be implemented this month

    "During the winding up of the debate on Budget 2023 in Parliament this Thursday (March 9), I will provide some positive developments in terms of national income, the actual amount of investment, not the MoU (Memorandum of Understanding),” said Anwar, who is also Finance Minister, at the monthly assembly with the staff of the Prime Minister’s Department here on Monday (March 6)

    Anwar also reminded the implementing agencies to expedite the implementation of flood mitigation projects without having to wait for the 2023 Budget to be approved

    "There is no need to wait for the full approval of the allocation because part of the allocation has been approved last December

  • 'MY SON IS ALIVE, BUT WHOSE BODY AM I BURYING?'

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2023/03/06/039my-son-is-alive-but-whose-body-am-i-burying039

    03/06/2023, 10:05

    64.71% Shortened!

    The father, who only wanted to be identified as Chantren, told Sinar Harian that the family's ordeal started when he received a call from the prison authority last Wednesday saying his son had died in jail

    Chantren was told to claim his son's remains at the Sungai Buloh Hospital which he did together with several other family members

    Upon claiming the body from Sungai Buloh Hospital, Chantren and family prepared for funeral rites at their family home in Tampin and made arrangements to bury their son's remains

    "We received a call from the prison authority about three or four hours before the burial time - and they informed us that my son was still alive

    Our son is still alive, but whose body is at our house now?" the father said

    According to Chantren, the prison authority had since gone to his house and collected the body and he has also requested to meet his son in prison.

    ['son', 'authority', 'sungai', 'buloh', 'prison']

    The father, who only wanted to be identified as Chantren, told Sinar Harian that the family's ordeal started when he received a call from the prison authority last Wednesday saying his son had died in jail

    Chantren was told to claim his son's remains at the Sungai Buloh Hospital which he did together with several other family members

    Upon claiming the body from Sungai Buloh Hospital, Chantren and family prepared for funeral rites at their family home in Tampin and made arrangements to bury their son's remains

    "We received a call from the prison authority about three or four hours before the burial time - and they informed us that my son was still alive

    Our son is still alive, but whose body is at our house now?" the father said

    According to Chantren, the prison authority had since gone to his house and collected the body and he has also requested to meet his son in prison.

    ['son', 'authority', 'sungai', 'buloh', 'prison']



  • HOME MINISTER: 15845 UNDOCUMENTED MIGRANTS BEING HELD IN DEPOTS AS OF JANUARY

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2023/03/06/home-minister-15845-undocumented-migrants-being-held-in-depots-as-of-january

    03/06/2023, 10:05

    57.14% Shortened!

    In a parliamentary written reply, the Home Minister said that from the total,1,968 were men, 2,683 were women, 656 were boys and 523 were girls

    Saifuddin also revealed that a total of 971 operations had been conducted this year, with a total of 3,129 arrests made against migrants and 34 employers

    In 2022, the Immigration Department had conducted a total of 8,033 enforcement operations with a total of 22,804 arrests on immigrants from various countries as well as 317 employers based on various immigration offences, he said

    He said that the Home Ministry viewed the issue of undocumented migrants seriously and it needed a comprehensive approach to deal with the issue

    "The Immigration Department also recorded a total of 37,038 undocumented migrants that had been deported in 2020, with 29,164 in 2021 and 38,904 in 2022

    "For the period between Jan 1 and Feb 8 this year, a total of 5,256 undocumented migrants had been deported so far," he said

    ['total', 'undocumented', 'migrant', 'immigration', 'country']

    In a parliamentary written reply, the Home Minister said that from the total,1,968 were men, 2,683 were women, 656 were boys and 523 were girls

    Saifuddin also revealed that a total of 971 operations had been conducted this year, with a total of 3,129 arrests made against migrants and 34 employers

    In 2022, the Immigration Department had conducted a total of 8,033 enforcement operations with a total of 22,804 arrests on immigrants from various countries as well as 317 employers based on various immigration offences, he said

    He said that the Home Ministry viewed the issue of undocumented migrants seriously and it needed a comprehensive approach to deal with the issue

    "The Immigration Department also recorded a total of 37,038 undocumented migrants that had been deported in 2020, with 29,164 in 2021 and 38,904 in 2022

    "For the period between Jan 1 and Feb 8 this year, a total of 5,256 undocumented migrants had been deported so far," he said

    ['total', 'undocumented', 'migrant', 'immigration', 'country']

  • BILLIONAIRE INVESTOR MOBIUS SAYS HE CANNOT TAKE INVESTMENTS OUT OF CHINA

    https://www.thestar.com.my/business/business-news/2023/03/06/billionaire-investor-mobius-says-he-cannot-take-investments-out-of-china

    03/06/2023, 09:05

    63.16% Shortened!

    Billionaire Mark Mobius told Fox Business he cannot take his money out of China due to the country’s capital controls

    I can’t take my money out

    The government is restricting flow of money out of the country,” Mobius, founder of Mobius Capital Partners, told FOX Business in an interview

    “I can’t get an explanation of why they’re doing this

    Now, though, he said, he “would be very, very careful” investing in the country

    “Now you have a government which is taking golden shares in companies all over China

    So I don’t think it’s a very good picture when you see the government becoming more and more control-oriented in the economy.” — Reuters

    ['mobius', 'take', 'money', 'china', 'country']

  • GOVT'S PLAN TO FACE ECONOMIC TURMOIL AMONG THE FOCUS IN DEWAN RAKYAT ON MARCH 6

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2023/03/06/govt039s-plan-to-face-economic-turmoil-among-the-focus-in-dewan-rakyat-on-march-6

    03/06/2023, 09:05

    45.45% Shortened!

    Monday, 06 Mar 2023

    Based on the Order Papers, Datuk Idris Ahmad (PN-Bagan Serai) will ask the Finance Minister whether the government is ready to provide incentives and assistance such as wage subsidies, special grants to small and medium enterprises (SME), Employee Provident Fund (EPF) withdrawals and other assistance as done by the previous government

    Riduan Rubin (Independent-Tenom) meanwhile wants the Finance Minister to state the government's plan to raise financial awareness among Malaysians especially in facing economic uncertainty this year

    Also, Muhammad Ismi Mat Taib (PN-Parit) will ask the Plantations and Commodities Minister to state whether the government plans to increase the Rubber Production Incentive (IPG) rate from RM2.50 to RM4.50 at this time

    Hassan Abdul Karim (PH-Pasir Gudang) will ask the Tourism, Arts and Culture Minister to state the steps taken by the government to address the recent issue of the increased cost of performing Umrah in Saudi Arabia

    Thank you for your report! Copyright © 1995-

    The company also offered disappointing guidance

    Coursera is predicting 1Q23 revenues in the range of $136 million to $140 million, compared to a forecast of $142.8 million; for all of 2023, the guidance is $595 million to $605 million, against a forecast of $618.5 million

    The stock is trading for $11.61 and its $19 average price target suggests a strong 64% one-year upside potential

  • A TRUE MCA ICON, A TRUE MALAYSIAN

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2023/03/06/a-true-mca-icon-a-true-malaysian

    03/06/2023, 08:05

    89.29% Shortened!

    Many were not aware that Lee, who was the fourth MCA president from April 1974 to March 1983, had been instrumental in ensuring that youth from the Chinese community had access to a tertiary education in public universities

    Ling (in blue) paying his respects to Lee

    Former MCA president Tan Sri Tan Koon Swan said he missed Lee as his “comrade in arms” when they worked together to bring changes to the Chinese community in the 1970s

    “He was the one who brought me into MCA

    He said he got to know Lee in Penang after joining MCA

    Lee, he added, played an important role in his political career

    ['lee', 'mca', 'president', 'chinese', 'community']

  • NINE YEARS ON, FAMILIES URGE NEW SEARCH FOR FLIGHT MH370

    https://www.malaysiakini.com/news/657430

    03/06/2023, 07:06

    50.0% Shortened!

    Families of those on board Malaysia Airlines flight MH370, which disappeared mysteriously nine years ago, called on the government on Sunday to allow US seabed exploration firm Ocean Infinity to mount a new search for the missing plane

    In 2018, Malaysia engaged Ocean Infinity to search for the aircraft in the southern Indian Ocean, offering to pay up to US$70 million if it found the plane

    The firm's search came after Malaysia, China and Australia ended a fruitless two-year, US$135.36 million underwater hunt in January 2017 after finding no trace of the plane

    On Sunday, Voice370 - a grouping of relatives of those aboard the plane - said Ocean Infinity hoped to embark on a new search as early as this summer and urged the government to accept any proposals from the firm on a conditional fee basis, such that the firm would only be paid if successful

    "Ocean Infinity, over the last 12 months has made real progress working with many people to further understand..

    "Ultimately, this has greatly improved their chances of conducting a successful search." Ocean Infinity and Transport Ministry did not immediately respond to a request for comment

    ['flight', 'mh370', 'firm', 'ocean', 'infinity']

    Families of those on board Malaysia Airlines flight MH370, which disappeared mysteriously nine years ago, called on the government on Sunday to allow US seabed exploration firm Ocean Infinity to mount a new search for the missing plane

    In 2018, Malaysia engaged Ocean Infinity to search for the aircraft in the southern Indian Ocean, offering to pay up to US$70 million if it found the plane

    The firm's search came after Malaysia, China and Australia ended a fruitless two-year, US$135.36 million underwater hunt in January 2017 after finding no trace of the plane

    On Sunday, Voice370 - a grouping of relatives of those aboard the plane - said Ocean Infinity hoped to embark on a new search as early as this summer and urged the government to accept any proposals from the firm on a conditional fee basis, such that the firm would only be paid if successful

    "Ocean Infinity, over the last 12 months has made real progress working with many people to further understand..

    "Ultimately, this has greatly improved their chances of conducting a successful search." Ocean Infinity and Transport Ministry did not immediately respond to a request for comment

    ['flight', 'mh370', 'firm', 'ocean', 'infinity']

    On turn four of the first lap, both Aston Martin drivers collided, but luckily Alonso avoided spinning and his race wasn't affected

    It was a good start to the season for the team, as Alonso finished on the podium and Stroll managed to claim sixth despite the shaky start

    "By the way, Lance is my hero," Alonso said

    "My team-mate had surgery 12 days ago and now he’s fighting right with everybody," Alonso added, beaming with pride for Stroll

  • SCAMMERS ARE USING VOICE-CLONING A.I. TOOLS TO SOUND LIKE VICTIMS’ RELATIVES IN DESPERATE NEED OF FINANCIAL HELP. IT’S WORKING.

    https://fortune.com/2023/03/05/scammers-ai-voice-cloning-tricking-victims-sound-like-relatives-needing-money/

    03/06/2023, 07:05

    77.78% Shortened!

    And you might be convinced it’s them because, well, you know their voice.  Artificial intelligence changes that

    tool that, when given just a three-second audio sample, can closely simulate a person’s voice

    If they can find 30 seconds of your voice somewhere online, there’s a good chance they can clone it—and make it say anything.  “Two years ago, even a year ago, you needed a lot of audio to clone a person’s voice

    Now…if you have a Facebook page…or if you’ve recorded a TikTok and your voice is in there for 30 seconds, people can clone your voice,” Hany Farid, a digital forensics professor at the University of California at Berkeley, told the Washington Post

    voice cloning—and lost thousand of dollars

    voice tool, ElevenLabs, tweeted on Jan

    ['need', 'voice', 'tool', 'clone', 'told']

  • NINE YEARS ON, FAMILIES URGE NEW SEARCH FOR MISSING FLIGHT MH370

    https://www.malaysiakini.com/news/657430

    03/06/2023, 07:05

    50.0% Shortened!

    Families of those on board Malaysia Airlines flight MH370, which disappeared mysteriously nine years ago, called on the government on Sunday to allow US seabed exploration firm Ocean Infinity to mount a new search for the missing plane

    In 2018, Malaysia engaged Ocean Infinity to search for the aircraft in the southern Indian Ocean, offering to pay up to US$70 million if it found the plane

    The firm's search came after Malaysia, China and Australia ended a fruitless two-year, US$135.36 million underwater hunt in January 2017 after finding no trace of the plane

    On Sunday, Voice370 - a grouping of relatives of those aboard the plane - said Ocean Infinity hoped to embark on a new search as early as this summer and urged the government to accept any proposals from the firm on a conditional fee basis, such that the firm would only be paid if successful

    "Ocean Infinity, over the last 12 months has made real progress working with many people to further understand..

    "Ultimately, this has greatly improved their chances of conducting a successful search." Ocean Infinity and Transport Ministry did not immediately respond to a request for comment

    ['flight', 'mh370', 'firm', 'ocean', 'infinity']

    Families of those on board Malaysia Airlines flight MH370, which disappeared mysteriously nine years ago, called on the government on Sunday to allow US seabed exploration firm Ocean Infinity to mount a new search for the missing plane

    In 2018, Malaysia engaged Ocean Infinity to search for the aircraft in the southern Indian Ocean, offering to pay up to US$70 million if it found the plane

    The firm's search came after Malaysia, China and Australia ended a fruitless two-year, US$135.36 million underwater hunt in January 2017 after finding no trace of the plane

    On Sunday, Voice370 - a grouping of relatives of those aboard the plane - said Ocean Infinity hoped to embark on a new search as early as this summer and urged the government to accept any proposals from the firm on a conditional fee basis, such that the firm would only be paid if successful

    "Ocean Infinity, over the last 12 months has made real progress working with many people to further understand..

    "Ultimately, this has greatly improved their chances of conducting a successful search." Ocean Infinity and Transport Ministry did not immediately respond to a request for comment

    ['flight', 'mh370', 'firm', 'ocean', 'infinity']

  • I'M RETIRING. CAN I LIVE OFF THE INTEREST I MADE INVESTING $2 MILLION?

    https://finance.yahoo.com//news/much-interest-does-2-million-175100886.html

    92.21% Shortened!

    Here’s what you need to know

    How to Live Off Interest The first thing to understand is how you live off interest

    To put it another way, first you need to know how much money you’ll need each month

    Why You Probably Can Live Off $2 Million Some particularly budget-conscious households might be able to live off the return of Treasury debt at $34,000 per year

    At $200,000 per year in average returns, this is more than enough for all but the highest spenders to live comfortably

    If you want to live off an index fund, you cannot live paycheck to paycheck

    ['interest', 'return', 'money', 'need', 'live']

    Here’s what you need to know

    At $200,000 per year in average returns, this is more than enough for all but the highest spenders to live comfortably

    If you want to live off an index fund, you cannot live paycheck to paycheck

  • SOCCER-LETHAL LIVERPOOL SMASH MANCHESTER UNITED FOR SEVEN IN RECORD WIN

    https://www.thestar.com.my/sport/football/2023/03/06/soccer-lethal-liverpool-smash-manchester-united-for-seven-in-record-win

    03/06/2023, 03:05

    80.0% Shortened!

    With United in disarray and losing their heads, Salah got in on the act to rifle in Liverpool's fourth in the 66th minute and Nunez then sent another header past helpless goalkeeper David De Gea in the 75th

    Salah rubbed salt into United wounds with a close-range effort to score a record 129th Premier League goal for the Merseyside club, taking him past the mark of Robbie Fowler

    Liverpool had thrashed United 4-0 at Anfield last April but considering the reversal of fortunes for the two clubs since, with United on the rise and Liverpool off the pace, this result was a major surprise

    Liverpool's fourth win in five league matches lifted them above Newcastle United into fifth on 42 points, three points behind fourth-placed Tottenham Hotspur with a game in hand

    "Today you could see the energy levels and everything was back, although to be fair the last few Premier League games had shown we were on the right path." Liverpool's previous biggest win over United was a 7-1 victory in 1895 when both clubs were in the second tier

    After that United's disintegration was spectacular as they suffered only their second defeat in the last 12 league games

    ['premier', 'league', 'liverpool', 'united', 'score']

    With United in disarray and losing their heads, Salah got in on the act to rifle in Liverpool's fourth in the 66th minute and Nunez then sent another header past helpless goalkeeper David De Gea in the 75th

    Salah rubbed salt into United wounds with a close-range effort to score a record 129th Premier League goal for the Merseyside club, taking him past the mark of Robbie Fowler

    Liverpool had thrashed United 4-0 at Anfield last April but considering the reversal of fortunes for the two clubs since, with United on the rise and Liverpool off the pace, this result was a major surprise

  • OIL INVESTORS GET $128 BILLION HANDOUT AS DOUBTS GROW ABOUT FOSSIL FUELS

    https://finance.yahoo.com//news/oil-128-billion-handout-doubts-150101988.html

    87.76% Shortened!

    Global investment in new oil and gas supplies already is expected to fall short of the minimum needed to keep up with demand by $140 billion this year, according to Evercore ISI

    “Five years ago, you would have seen very significant year-on-year oil-supply growth, but you’re not seeing that today,” Arnold said

    “It’s one of the bull stories for oil — that the supply growth that had come out of the US has now stopped.” The US is crucial to global crude supply not just because it’s the world’s biggest oil producer

    But with buybacks and dividends swallowing up more and more cash flow, shale is no longer the global oil system’s ace in the hole

    US oil production is expected to grow just 5% this year to 12.5 million barrels a day, according to the Energy Information Administration

    S&P Global expects global oil demand to reach an all-time high of 102 million barrels per day

    ['oil', 'high', 'supply', 'global', 'year']

  • ASK AN ADVISOR: HELP ME UNDERSTAND THE MATH. HOW DOES DONATING TO CHARITY REDUCE MY TAXES?

    https://finance.yahoo.com//news/ask-advisor-help-understand-math-163817582.html

    89.47% Shortened!

    Know the deduction limits

    That way you can itemize for the 2022 tax year and take the high standard deduction for tax year 2023

    With a DAF, you make a sizable tax-deductible contribution in one year to maximize your itemized deductions for that tax year

    You only get a tax deduction when you fund the DAF, not when the DAF distributes the money to organizations

    And you still get a charitable donation deduction to reduce your tax bill

    These donations won’t be deductible, but you’ll still get a tax benefit

    ['make', 'donation', 'get', 'tax', 'deduction']

  • ‘FINANCIAL ILLITERACY IS AN EPIDEMIC’: AMERICANS LOST AN AVERAGE OF OVER $1,800 TO FINANCIAL ERRORS IN 2022 — HERE ARE 3 BIG MONEY MISTAKES YOU COULD BE MAKING RIGHT NOW

    https://finance.yahoo.com//news/financial-illiteracy-epidemic-americans-lost-130000017.html

    85.37% Shortened!

    Credit card companies charge people an annual percentage rate (APR) for borrowing money

    The current average credit card APR is 23.39%, according to LendingTree data, but someone with a poor credit score could face an APR closer to 27%

    Simply asking your credit card issuer about repayment options is worth a try

    “For those in debt, opening a credit card bill can be disheartening and feel overwhelming,” says Shorb

    According to the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau (CFPB), a typical overdraft fee is around $34

    If you have overdraft protection, you could ask your bank to remove your overdraft plan so that you can’t overdraw your account at all — but this means your card could decline if you attempt to make a purchase and you don’t have enough cash in the account

    ['financial', 'say', 'cost', 'credit', 'card']

    The Pentagon in November said China's air force was "quickly catching up with" Western ones

    China is also modernising Cambodia's Ream naval base, but it is unclear whether a Chinese unit will be stationed there

    This means China's cabinet, the State Council, has no say in decisions linked to military deployment

    China's nuclear stockpile is expected to increase to about 1,500 warheads by 2035, the Pentagon said last year

    China has a strict "no first use" policy on nuclear weapons

  • MANCHESTER UNITED: ERIK TEN HAG HAS SHOWN HOW TO MAKE THE MOST OUT OF FRED

    https://www.dailymail.co.uk/sport/football/article-11811789/Manchester-United-Erik-ten-Hag-shown-make-Fred.html

    03/05/2023, 20:05

    68.42% Shortened!

    Fred is enjoying his best season at Manchester United despite a reduction in his minutes Erik ten Hag has shown how to get the best out of Fred and get the most out of his strengths The signing of Casemiro has been particularly influential in helping Fred improve this season Ten Hag's arrival at the club raised the question of whether Fred had a future at the club - talk which heightened after United lost their first two matches of the season  with a 2-1 loss to Brighton and a 4-0 thumping by Brentford - both of which the Brazilian started and struggled.  Following the loss to Brentford, Fred started just two league games before January's 2-1 victory over rivals Man City.   But that doesn't tell the full story as Fred has often been Ten Hag's go-to player off the bench, improving after being given reduced on-field responsibilities and a clearer role.   He has played a bigger part since the World Cup, registering five goals - including a vital finish in their Europa League victory over Barcelona - and three assists in that time.  In the 20 matches he's played since the return of domestic football, he's started ten games

    Though it should be noted that Christian Eriksen's injury has opened the door for Fred to reclaim a place in the starting XI.  But now as a starter, Fred looks more comfortable now that he has that defensive rock alongside him in Casemiro

    Casemiro's presence has minimised the amount of work Fred needs to do defensively in games, which has allowed Ten Hag to tactically move the latter further up the pitch

    United were heavily interested in signing the Dutchman from Barcelona last summer, after impressing Ten Hag during their time together at Ajax

    The signing of De Jong could have further impacted Fred's game time at Old Trafford

    However, Fred more than proved his worth as De Jong was marked out of the game

    ['united', 'player', 'season', 'ten', 'hag']

    Fred is enjoying his best season at Manchester United despite a reduction in his minutes Erik ten Hag has shown how to get the best out of Fred and get the most out of his strengths The signing of Casemiro has been particularly influential in helping Fred improve this season Ten Hag's arrival at the club raised the question of whether Fred had a future at the club - talk which heightened after United lost their first two matches of the season  with a 2-1 loss to Brighton and a 4-0 thumping by Brentford - both of which the Brazilian started and struggled.  Following the loss to Brentford, Fred started just two league games before January's 2-1 victory over rivals Man City.   But that doesn't tell the full story as Fred has often been Ten Hag's go-to player off the bench, improving after being given reduced on-field responsibilities and a clearer role.   He has played a bigger part since the World Cup, registering five goals - including a vital finish in their Europa League victory over Barcelona - and three assists in that time.  In the 20 matches he's played since the return of domestic football, he's started ten games

    Though it should be noted that Christian Eriksen's injury has opened the door for Fred to reclaim a place in the starting XI.  But now as a starter, Fred looks more comfortable now that he has that defensive rock alongside him in Casemiro

    Casemiro's presence has minimised the amount of work Fred needs to do defensively in games, which has allowed Ten Hag to tactically move the latter further up the pitch

    United were heavily interested in signing the Dutchman from Barcelona last summer, after impressing Ten Hag during their time together at Ajax

    The signing of De Jong could have further impacted Fred's game time at Old Trafford

    However, Fred more than proved his worth as De Jong was marked out of the game

    ['united', 'player', 'season', 'ten', 'hag']

  • RETAILER GROUPS URGE GOVT TO RETHINK LUXURY TAX

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2023/03/05/retailer-groups-urge-government-rethink-luxury-tax

    03/05/2023, 20:05

    62.5% Shortened!

    In a joint statement, the groups said the tax would make Malaysia non-competitive and make the country less attractive for tourists

    They said the tax could also drive Malaysians to go overseas to buy luxury goods

    "Even if a mechanism can be designed for foreign tourists to claim back these luxury taxes, Malaysians would still be forced to do their shopping overseas," read the joint statement issued on Sunday (March 5)

    It was jointly issued by the Malaysia Shopping Malls Association, BBKLCC Tourism Association Kuala Lumpur, Batu Road Retailers Association, Bumiputra Retailers Organisation, Federation of Malaysia Business Associations, Industries Unite, Malaysia Retailers Association and the Malaysia Retail Chain Association

    They said that only luxury items should be taken into account if the government decides to move forward with the new tax

    In Budget 2023, Prime Minister Datuk Seri Anwar Ibrahim announced a luxury goods tax for certain luxury brands, like watches and fashion goods, that would be implemented as part of the government's efforts to tackle the country's current rising cost of living issue

    ['retailer', 'association', 'government', 'luxury', 'tax']

    03/05/2023, 20:05

    50.0% Shortened!

    About Us Advertise ALOR SETAR, March 5 — Umno will publish the letter from the Registrar of Societies (RoS) approving an additional motion that the posts of president and deputy president will not be challenged in the party’s elections this year

    Umno president Datuk Seri Ahmad Zahid Hamidi said he would ask the party’s secretary-general Datuk Seri Ahmad Maslan to see to this so that all Umno members are informed

    Ahmad Zahid, who is also Rural and Regional Development Minister, said it is hoped that the letter from RoS could bring to an end any polemic against the motion approved during the 2022 Umno general assembly last January

    Earlier, Ahmad Zahid attended a ceremony to introduce Kedah and Perlis candidates contesting the upcoming party elections, Also present was Umno deputy president Datuk Seri Mohamad Hasan

    Yesterday, Ahmad Zahid informed that Umno had received a letter from Home Minister Datuk Seri Saifuddin Nasution Ismail regarding RoS’ decision on Friday

    Earlier Umno vice-president Datuk Seri Ismail Sabri Yaakob reportedly asked Ahmad Zahid to produce the letter from RoS following the controversy over the additional motion passed at the 2022 Umno general assembly

    ['umno', 'president', 'party', 'datuk', 'seri']

    About Us Advertise KUALA LUMPUR, March 5 — Malaysia would carefully evaluate new search operations for Flight MH370 were new and credible information to emerge about its location, Transport Minister Anthony Loke said today

    In a message ahead of the ninth anniversary of the plane’s disappearance in 2014, Loke also expressed his sympathies to the families of those on board the Malaysia Airlines flight that vanished without a trace

    “As transport minister, I will not summarily close the book on this tragedy,” Loke said

    To date, the plane as well as the 239 (227 passengers 12 crew) passengers have not been found despite a multinational search effort that lasted years

    It has been recorded as the most expensive search effort in aviation history

    “I was a student at the time and now am a mother

    03/05/2023, 19:05

    57.14% Shortened!

    Brandt has long been linked with a move to the Premier League leaders over the past few years, but he has remained loyal to Dortmund since joining from Bayer Leverkusen in 2019

    Dortmund could therefore come under pressure to sell Brandt this summer before he walks away for nothing in 2024, and he would seemingly not be short of suitors amid an eye-catching season for Edin Terzic's side

    According to German outlet Bild, Arsenal remain attentive to Brandt's situation and could make a move for the German this summer if he opts not to renew his Dortmund contract

    The report states that Brandt would welcome a change of scenery at this stage of his career, and he has informed his entourage that he would be interested in a move to the Premier League

    Since joining for a €25m (£22.1m) fee from Leverkusen in the summer of 2019, Brandt has made 158 appearances for Dortmund in all tournaments, scoring 29 goals and setting up 30 more

    While adept in the number 10 role, Brandt has recently been deployed as a winger - an area where Arsenal may be looking for additional cover in the summer transfer window

    ['brandt', 'move', 'premier', 'league', 'dortmund']

    https://www.channelnewsasia.com/asia/malaysia-johor-floods-government-will-not-declare-disaster-emergency-anwar-ibrahim-3326316

    03/05/2023, 19:05

    68.42% Shortened!

    People wade through a flooded residential area at Yong Peng, Johor, Malaysia on Mar 4, 2023

    “As such, we decided that expensive flood mitigation projects worth RM600 million (US$134 million) and more will be expedited.” Mr Anwar said the postponement of six flood mitigation projects before this was to avoid leakages in allocations to assist the people

    “The government’s decision to not declare a state of emergency is because rain has started to taper off and floodwaters have begun to recede in several places," he said

    “Although there are also some places where the floodwaters remain stagnant, there is no need for a (disaster) emergency (to be declared) for now,” he told reporters after visiting a relief centre at Sekolah Jenis Kebangsaan (Cina) Kampung Tengah

    A Cabinet meeting on Friday had decided that there was no need for a flood emergency to be declared in Johor

    The number of flood victims in relief centres in Johor, Pahang and Melaka continued to rise, while two other states showed a drop as of 2pm on Sunday

  • CRYPTO’S FAVORITE BANK IS ON THE BRINK. WHAT HAPPENS IF SILVERGATE FAILS?

    https://finance.yahoo.com//news/crypto-favorite-bank-brink-happens-120000832.html

    84.62% Shortened!

    The biggest loser after FTX itself may be Silvergate, the California-based bank that established itself as the crypto industry's financial backbone

    At the time of FTX's collapse, about 90% of the bank’s deposit base came from crypto companies

    Its share price began to teeter with the start of crypto’s bear market following the collapse of TerraUSD in May 2022, and the bankruptcy of industry giant FTX exacerbated that—crypto companies no longer had money to deposit with Silvergate

    Silvergate would then have 90 days to raise capital or sell itself to another bank

    Silvergate’s failure, Silvia added, has much more to do with FTX than regulators

    bank that's established itself as crypto-friendly, Signature, has displayed more reticence toward working with the industry

    ['crypto', 'silvergate', 'bank', 'financial', 'deposit']

    The full design of the Kia EV6 will be unveiled on 15th March 2023 and the Korean carmaker has dropped a couple of video teasers of its design and lighting effects

  • PLS PLANTATIONS BAGS RM210M INVESTMENT FROM JAPAN’S MYFARM FOR MALAYSIAN DURIAN OPS

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/money/2023/03/05/pls-plantations-bags-rm210m-investment-from-japans-myfarm-for-malaysian-durian-ops/58106

    03/05/2023, 18:05

    60.0% Shortened!

    PLS Plantations is headed by chairman Tan Sri Nazir Razak, who said the capital injection from the Japanese company will help the construction and plantation group realise a portion of its early investment in durian plantations

    The joint venture and shareholders’ agreement was signed between PLS Plantations’ 51 per cent-owned subsidiary PLS-LESB Sdn Bhd, MYFARM and MYFARM’s unit Millennium Agriculture Technology Sdn Bhd (MAT) today

    Under the deal, MAT will subscribe to a 49 per cent stake in JV company Akar Barat Sdn Bhd with the agreement to pay PLS-LESB up to RM181.8 million of the investment consideration

    PLS-LESB will be the majority stakeholder in the JV vehicle, with a 51 per cent stake, The Edge reported

    The business paper said MYFARM will collaborate to boost PLS Plantations’ technology at its durian farms

    Lim holds a 73 per cent stake in the company via Ekovest Bhd

    ['company', 'myfarm', 'pls', 'plantation', 'bhd']

  • CHINA INCREASES MILITARY SPENDING IN FACE OF 'ESCALATING' THREATS

    https://www.thestar.com.my/aseanplus/aseanplus-news/2023/03/05/china-increases-military-spending-in-face-of-039escalating039-threats

    03/05/2023, 17:05

    82.35% Shortened!

    The increase in the world's second-largest defence budget came as Beijing announced an economic growth goal of around five percent for this year -- one of its lowest in decades

    It officially rose 7.1 percent last year

    China's defence spending still pales in comparison with the United States, which has allotted over $800 billion for its military this year

    "Given the very low base of economic activities last year, it is unlikely to see growth drop below five percent." Li struck a bullish tone in his speech, saying China's economy "is staging a steady recovery and demonstrating vast potential and momentum for further growth"

    He lauded Beijing's growth-suppressing Covid curbs -- abruptly abandoned late last year -- and "effective and well-coordinated" economic and social development

    "It is even, to some extent, more important than economic growth," he told AFP

    ['beijing', 'china', 'say', 'military', 'year']

  • OVERNIGHT POLICY RATE TO INFLUENCE BURSA MALAYSIA'S PERFORMANCE THIS WEEK

    https://www.thestar.com.my/aseanplus/aseanplus-news/2023/03/05/overnight-policy-rate-to-influence-bursa-malaysia039s-performance-this-week

    03/05/2023, 17:05

    81.25% Shortened!

    On the index board, the FBM Emas Index fell 38.01 points to 10,588.43, the FBMT 100 Index slid 28.06 points to 10,269.76, and the FBM Emas Shariah Index went down 116.55 points to 10,814.04

    The FBM 70 Index dipped 58.60 points to 13,446.61, and the FBM ACE Index was 133.32 points lower at 5,426.73

    Weekly turnover declined to 16.13 billion units worth RM11.85 billion against 16.79 billion units worth RM10.89 billion on Friday last week

    The Main Market volume grew to 11.19 billion shares valued at RM10.33 billion from 10.35 billion shares valued at RM9.02 billion a week ago

    Warrants turnover fell slightly to 1.64 billion units worth RM295.43 million from 1.90 billion units worth RM297.03 million previously

    The ACE Market volume decreased to 3.24 billion shares worth RM1.21 billion from 4.16 billion shares worth RM1.56 billion

    ['week', 'opr', 'say', 'point', 'fbm']

    On the index board, the FBM Emas Index fell 38.01 points to 10,588.43, the FBMT 100 Index slid 28.06 points to 10,269.76, and the FBM Emas Shariah Index went down 116.55 points to 10,814.04

    The FBM 70 Index dipped 58.60 points to 13,446.61, and the FBM ACE Index was 133.32 points lower at 5,426.73

    The government is restricting flow of money out of the country," Mobius, founder of Mobius Capital Partners, told FOX Business in an interview published on March 2

    This is crazy." Mobius' comments were circulated on Chinese social media site WeChat at the weekend

    So I don't think it's a very good picture when you see the government becoming more and more control-oriented in the economy." Mobius, who calls himself "the Indiana Jones of Emerging Market investing", told FOX Business he's increasing exposure to alternative markets such as India and Brazil

    Mobius and HSBC could not be reached at the weekend

  • PLS PLANTATIONS' DURIAN BUSINESS GETS RM210M BOOST FROM JAPAN'S MYFARM

    https://www.theedgemarkets.com/node/657832

    03/05/2023, 15:05

    73.91% Shortened!

    PLS Plantations group chairman Tan Sri Nazir Razak said the capital injection from the Japanese agritech company will help the construction and plantation group realise a portion of its early investment in durian plantations

    From this partnership, we can monetise some of our early investment,” he told reporters after the signing of a joint venture (JV) and shareholders’ agreement between PLS Plantations' 51%-owned subsidiary PLS-LESB Sdn Bhd, MYFARM and MYFARM's unit Millennium Agriculture Technology Sdn Bhd (MAT) on Sunday (March 5)

    PLS-LESB will be the majority stakeholder in the JV vehicle, with a 51% stake

    “Over the next three to five years, the group will see more meaningful returns from the durian plantation segment

    Nazir pointed out that PLS Plantations is aiming to have an additional 10,000ha of plantation land for its cash crops in the next five years, depending on the group's potential to rope in partners

    “We are looking to start with 10,000 acres of land for pineapple plantation as a start,” he said

    ['myfarm', 'pls', 'plantation', 'group', 'durian']

    “For example, among Puteri Umno, if they have exceeded the age [to be Puteri Umno] they should get support from divisions to take over Wanita Umno posts

    She believed that after the party election, the party will receive support, and as long as Umno is united, they will be able to regain the people’s trust

    “This is important because it is people outside of Umno who will decide the fate of the party

    On the party’s involvement in the unity government, she said that there still many talents within Umno and they should be given an opportunity to serve in the party

    “So in my opinion, it is better for Umno to be part of the government because Umno must show party leadership in determining the policies and direction of the country

    “We want to see Umno synonymous with the will of the people, so we have to play our role in the government so that the people can feel that Umno has a clear direction, that it will fight for the people,” she was quoted as saying

  • PROTON X90 CONFIRMED TO GET 48V HYBRID TURBO ENGINE - PAULTAN.ORG

    https://paultan.org/2023/03/05/proton-x90-48v-hybrid-turbo/

    03/05/2023, 13:06

    72.73% Shortened!

    According to these reports, the Proton X90 will be a mild hybrid electric vehicle (MHEV)

    The MHEV hybrid system is expected to be a 1.5 litre three-cylinder 48V engine+motor combo producing 190 PS at 5,500 rpm and 300 Nm of torque from 1,500-4,000 rpm, which is higher than the 177 PS, 255 Nm non-hybrid version of the engine

    Firstly, Proton has already exhibited this engine at Proton’s Centre of Excellence showroom in Shah Alam back in November 2021

    How does the Proton X90’s 48V hybrid system work? The system takes the regular 3-cylinder 1.5 litre turbocharged engine and adds a number of components to it

    The hybrid system can provide 13 horsepower and 45 Nm of assist, which is what brings the 177 PS, 255 Nm numbers of the non-hybrid up to 190 PS and 300 Nm in the hybrid

    Since it’s called a ‘mild’ hybrid system, the capabilities are also modest

    ['proton', 'hybrid', 'x90', 'system', '48v']

    According to these reports, the Proton X90 will be a mild hybrid electric vehicle (MHEV)

    The MHEV hybrid system is expected to be a 1.5 litre three-cylinder 48V engine+motor combo producing 190 PS at 5,500 rpm and 300 Nm of torque from 1,500-4,000 rpm, which is higher than the 177 PS, 255 Nm non-hybrid version of the engine

    Firstly, Proton has already exhibited this engine at Proton’s Centre of Excellence showroom in Shah Alam back in November 2021

    How does the Proton X90’s 48V hybrid system work? The system takes the regular 3-cylinder 1.5 litre turbocharged engine and adds a number of components to it

    The hybrid system can provide 13 horsepower and 45 Nm of assist, which is what brings the 177 PS, 255 Nm numbers of the non-hybrid up to 190 PS and 300 Nm in the hybrid

    Since it’s called a ‘mild’ hybrid system, the capabilities are also modest

    ['proton', 'hybrid', 'x90', 'system', '48v']



  • NAJIB’S DAUGHTER SAYS JUDGE WHO ACQUITTED DAD OF 1MDB AUDIT TAMPERING CASE SAME PERSON WHO CONVICTED MUM ROSMAH, RULING FACTUAL

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2023/03/05/najibs-daughter-says-judge-who-acquitted-dad-of-1mdb-audit-tampering-case-same-person-who-convicted-mum-rosmah-ruling-factual/58073

    03/05/2023, 13:06

    72.73% Shortened!

    About Us Advertise KUALA LUMPUR, March 5 — Nooryana Najwa Najib has a reminder for sceptics who question the acquittal of her father and former prime minister Datuk Seri Najib Razak of the 1MDB audit tampering charge last week

    This means Najib, who was also the former finance minister, no longer has to face the charge under Section 23(1) of the Malaysian Anti-Corruption Commission Act 2009

    Yana is Nooryana’s nickname while Bossku is the moniker given to Najib

    In order to prove a prima facie case for Najib to defend himself, the prosecution would have to prove all elements of the Section 23(1) charge against him, namely that Najib was an officer of a public body and that he used his office for “gratification”

    The High Court noted that there was no dispute with the first element as Najib was an officer of a public body as the prime minister and finance minister then, but concluded that the prosecution failed to prove the second element involving gratification

    This ultimately led to Najib’s acquittal last Friday

    ['nooryana', 'najib', 'father', 'minister', '1mdb']

    About Us Advertise KUALA LUMPUR, March 5 — Nooryana Najwa Najib has a reminder for sceptics who question the acquittal of her father and former prime minister Datuk Seri Najib Razak of the 1MDB audit tampering charge last week

    This means Najib, who was also the former finance minister, no longer has to face the charge under Section 23(1) of the Malaysian Anti-Corruption Commission Act 2009

    Yana is Nooryana’s nickname while Bossku is the moniker given to Najib

    In order to prove a prima facie case for Najib to defend himself, the prosecution would have to prove all elements of the Section 23(1) charge against him, namely that Najib was an officer of a public body and that he used his office for “gratification”

    The High Court noted that there was no dispute with the first element as Najib was an officer of a public body as the prime minister and finance minister then, but concluded that the prosecution failed to prove the second element involving gratification

    This ultimately led to Najib’s acquittal last Friday

    ['nooryana', 'najib', 'father', 'minister', '1mdb']

  • INDONESIA'S INFLATION TO STAY ABOVE 5% IN FIRST HALF: CENTRAL BANK CHIEF

    https://www.channelnewsasia.com/asia/indonesia-inflation-stay-above-5-cent-first-half-central-bank-chief-3326056

    03/05/2023, 13:05

    64.71% Shortened!

    Indonesia's Central Bank Governor Perry Warjiyo arrives for a media briefing at Bank Indonesia headquarters in Jakarta, Indonesia, Jan 19, 2023

    "The game is not over, let us together anticipate inflation, mainly food inflation," Perry said at an event on Makassar, in South Sulawesi, where he urged local authorities to work with the central government to reduce inflationary pressures

    "We must control inflation because it relates to people's prosperity and welfare," he said

    "Let's strengthen synergy amongst stakeholders to control inflation." The Consumer Price Index in Southeast Asia's largest economy rose 5.47 per cent in February from a year earlier, largely due to higher prices for fuel, rice, cigarettes and air travel, though core inflation unexpectedly slowed to 3.09 per cent

    To help Indonesians deal with inflation, the government will provide social assistance by distributing rice, eggs, and chicken, chief economic minister Airlangga Hartarto said at the Makassar event

    "The government and central bank will continue our synergy" to achieve the government's target of 3.6 per cent for the full year, "and this will become a strong foundation to face uncertainty in 2023 and 2024," Airlangga said

    ['indonesia', 'inflation', 'per', 'cent', 'food']

    Indonesia's Central Bank Governor Perry Warjiyo arrives for a media briefing at Bank Indonesia headquarters in Jakarta, Indonesia, Jan 19, 2023

    "The game is not over, let us together anticipate inflation, mainly food inflation," Perry said at an event on Makassar, in South Sulawesi, where he urged local authorities to work with the central government to reduce inflationary pressures

    "We must control inflation because it relates to people's prosperity and welfare," he said

    "Let's strengthen synergy amongst stakeholders to control inflation." The Consumer Price Index in Southeast Asia's largest economy rose 5.47 per cent in February from a year earlier, largely due to higher prices for fuel, rice, cigarettes and air travel, though core inflation unexpectedly slowed to 3.09 per cent

    To help Indonesians deal with inflation, the government will provide social assistance by distributing rice, eggs, and chicken, chief economic minister Airlangga Hartarto said at the Makassar event

    "The government and central bank will continue our synergy" to achieve the government's target of 3.6 per cent for the full year, "and this will become a strong foundation to face uncertainty in 2023 and 2024," Airlangga said

    ['indonesia', 'inflation', 'per', 'cent', 'food']

    Just when it appeared that the hosts would unravel in the second period, Potter's half-time instructions propelled them into a second half start which yielded the winning goal

  • PERIKATAN TO CONSIDER PEJUANG'S BID TO JOIN BLOC, HADI SAYS

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2023/03/05/perikatan-to-consider-pejuangs-bid-to-join-bloc-hadi-says/58053

    03/05/2023

    45.45% Shortened!

    The coalition will consider Pejuang’s application collectively, the MP for Marang told reporters at an event held in his constituency in Terengganu last night

    “We did receive Pejuang’s application form to join PN; we’ll discuss it in a meeting,” he said at a news conference that was aired on his Facebook account

    Pejuang president Datuk Seri Mukhriz Mahathir disclosed that the decision to join PN was made by his party’s executive council and its application was submitted last Tuesday

    Mukhriz’s father and former two-time prime minister Tun Dr Mahathir Mohamad, who had been chairman of Pejuang, quit the party with 12 others last month, after it cut ties with the Gerakan Tanah Air (GTA) coalition

    He stepped down as Pejuang chairman on December 16, 2020 after all 125 of GTA candidates including him and Mukhriz lost their seats at the 15th general election but stayed on as GTA chairman

    Dr Mahathir denied he was aware of Pejuang’s application to join PN, shortly after news surfaced

    ['pejuang', 'join', 'application', 'last', 'mahathir']

  • EPF'S 2022 DIVIDEND EXCEEDS INFLATION RATE, HIGHER THAN 10-YEAR MGS YIELDS, SAYS ECONOMIC EXPERTS

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2023/03/05/epf039s-2022-dividend-exceeds-inflation-rate-higher-than-10-year-mgs-yields-says-economic-experts

    03/05/2023, 12:04

    81.82% Shortened!

    In 2021, the EPF declared dividends of 6.1% for conventional savings and 5.65% for shariah savings

    The EPF also reported a positive rebound in member registrations following the robust recovery in the Malaysian labour market, and this helped the fund record strong growth of new member registrations of 635,989 in 2022

    Commenting on the positive growth of EPF memberships, Mohd Afzanizam said this indicates that the improvement in the labour market is moving along with the higher number of EPF members

    Such a notion is in line with the contribution received by the EPF

    Mohd Afzanizam said there seems to be a lack of financial literacy among those who are asking for more EPF withdrawals

    "However, EPF members need to keep the money with EPF for as long as possible in order to enjoy the accumulated investment returns over a longer period,” he said

    ['epf', 'dividend', 'say', 'also', 'member']

    In 2021, the EPF declared dividends of 6.1% for conventional savings and 5.65% for shariah savings

    The EPF also reported a positive rebound in member registrations following the robust recovery in the Malaysian labour market, and this helped the fund record strong growth of new member registrations of 635,989 in 2022

    Commenting on the positive growth of EPF memberships, Mohd Afzanizam said this indicates that the improvement in the labour market is moving along with the higher number of EPF members

    Such a notion is in line with the contribution received by the EPF

    Mohd Afzanizam said there seems to be a lack of financial literacy among those who are asking for more EPF withdrawals

    "However, EPF members need to keep the money with EPF for as long as possible in order to enjoy the accumulated investment returns over a longer period,” he said

    "Scientific and technological policies should aim at building up our country’s strength and self-reliance in science and technology," the outgoing premier said in his work report to the opening of the annual meeting of China's parliament

    President Xi Jinping has urged the country to strengthen its self-reliance in science and technology and continue to strive as a global tech power

    Li said China should accelerate the research and development of cutting-edge technologies and promote their application

    The platform economy comprises China's largest tech companies, such as Alibaba Group and Tencent Holdings

    https://finance.yahoo.com//news/shark-tank-investor-kevin-o-192308024.html

    53.33% Shortened!

    “Over the last three years there’s a new generation of worker—particularly in financial services and in technology or in engineering—that has no intention of working in an office,” he told CNN on Friday

    “They never have, they never will

    People keep saying, ‘Oh, they’re gonna all come back.’ They’re not.” According to O’Leary, 44% of the employees across his venture portfolio work remotely, and “they ain’t coming into the office, period

    They’ve never worked in an office

    If you don’t work in the office, I can call you at two in the morning if we’ve got a crisis

    And they’re gonna answer

    That’s the way they’re used to it now.” O’Leary isn’t alone in believing the office’s diminishment will last

    ['worker', 'come', 'office', 'say', 'leary']

  • CIVIC ENGAGEMENT COURSE FOR NEW PPR HOMEOWNERS FROM THIS YEAR: NGA

    03/05/2023, 10:06

    “A solid civic consciousness will create a more environmentally and resident-friendly community

    “They need to attend this civic course because all quarters must understand their responsibility when using common facilities (provided at the housing area)

    Implemented by the National Housing Department, PPR is a programme introduced by the government to relocate the squatter community and fulfil the needs of the low-income group

    It consists of two categories, namely ‘PPR Disewa’ (rented) and ‘PPR Dimiliki’ (owned), both of which adhere to the planning and design specifications outlined in the National Housing Standards for Low-Cost Residential Flats (CIS2)

    “We will add new features to this housing project so that it is more livable, environmentally friendly, resident friendly and include commercial elements and landscaping to make it more comfortable for the residents,” he said

    “This year, we also managed to get a special allocation of RM50 million to replace damaged and old elevators in PPR flats

    03/05/2023, 09:06

    Raphael Varane has played an important role in Manchester United's revival under Erik ten Hag but could miss their upcoming Premier League clash against Liverpool Raphael Varane will have a late fitness test ahead of Manchester United's Premier League trip to Liverpool on Sunday afternoon

    Erik ten Hag is expected to give Harry Maguire the nod if Varane is not fit, with Lisandro Martinez set to continue at left-centre-back

    Ten Hag's preferred centre-back partnership is Varane on the right and Martinez on the left

    The Dutchman likes his right-centre-back to be right-footed, which means club captain Maguire or fellow defender Victor Lindelof are Varane's obvious deputies

    Varane is United's most experienced centre-back after winning the World Cup with France and the Champions League four times with Real Madrid

    Varane's injury record is not the best

    ['varane', 'united', 'ten', 'hag', 'league']

    The Umno president said the party had received a letter from the Home Minister regarding ROS’ decision on Saturday (March 4)

    He said the letter from the Home Minister confirmed that the additional motion was valid

    Meanwhile, Ahmad Zahid said all Umno members should give priority to strengthening the party and defending the Unity Government

    "The current government must be defended because Umno is part of it...any agenda that can undermine the government (shouldn’t be pursued) and do not elect figures who can undermine the government," he said

    The Umno elections kicked off on Feb 1 and will run until March 18

    ['umno', 'president', 'ahmad', 'zahid', 'motion']

    Umno president Datuk Seri Ahmad Zahid Hamidi announces that the ROS has given the nod for Umno's no contest motion as party secretary-general Datuk Seri Ahmad Mazlan looks on

    The Umno president said the party had received a letter from the Home Minister regarding ROS’ decision on Saturday (March 4)

    He said the letter from the Home Minister confirmed that the additional motion was valid

    Meanwhile, Ahmad Zahid said all Umno members should give priority to strengthening the party and defending the Unity Government

    "The current government must be defended because Umno is part of it...any agenda that can undermine the government (shouldn’t be pursued) and do not elect figures who can undermine the government," he said

  • PM'S BROTHER SAYS GOVT PERSECUTING HIS FAMILY

    https://www.thestar.com.my/aseanplus/aseanplus-news/2023/03/05/pms-brother-says-govt-persecuting-his-family

    03/05/2023, 09:05

    71.43% Shortened!

    FILE - The family members of the late Lee Kuan Yew, Lee Hsien Yang, second left, his wife Lee Suet Fern, left, and Lee Hsien Loong, third left, arrive with his portrait at the state funeral at the University Cultural Center in Singapore on March 29, 2015

    The brother of Singapore's prime minister is accusing government authorities of persecuting his family after it emerged that he and his wife were under official investigation

    Lee Hsien Yang has long been at odds with his brother, Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong, over the will of their late father - Singapore's first prime minister, Lee Kuan Yew

    Lee Hsien Yang has long been at odds with his brother, Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong, over the will of their late father – longtime Prime Minister Lee Kuan Yew, who ushered Singapore through independence from Britain

    The family feud had largely died down until Senior Minister and Coordinating Minister for National Security Teo Chee Hean told lawmakers that Hsien Yang and his wife Lee Suet Fern were under investigation

    Hsien Yang and his sister have accused their brother, the prime minister, of instead preserving the house to “enhance his political capital” as a “visible symbol” of their father

    ['family', 'lee', 'hsien', 'yang', 'singapore']

    The brother of Singapore's prime minister is accusing government authorities of persecuting his family after it emerged that he and his wife were under official investigation

    If Van Dijk or any defender is moving one way and the ball is played behind them, the forward is already on the move and away

    Van Dijk’s best partner at the back is Ibrahima Konate

    Van Dijk would probably prefer to face Weghorst

    "But Erik did, he did not mind sorting it all out and didn’t mind walking around Cristiano’s landmines

    ERIK TEN HAG 'dodged mines laid by Cristiano Ronaldo' and ignored Louis van Gaal's advice to join Manchester United

    "Erik went to United because he saw the potential and the challenge

    "You know what Van Gaal said to Ten Hag, don’t you? ‘Erik, it is one big mess at United, don’t go there’

    "But Erik did, he did not mind sorting it all out and didn’t mind walking around Cristiano’s landmines

    "This is why I say, ‘don’t laugh at Ten Hag and never underestimate him.’ Erik will always rise above all the expectations.” Zwijnenberg has been mates with Ten Hag since they were 13-years-old and he explained that the United gaffer prefers to do his talking with trophies

    I know him, I know what he had in mind, and I also know what he has in mind for the next few years at the club

    ['erik', 'ten', 'hag', 'united', 'know']

    Carvalho's absence from Liverpool's first team has also been quite abrupt

    In some ways, he is fortunate to have not played a part in some of the poor displays in 2023, but with Firmino's exit looking more likely, he could now begin to receive more clarity over his future role

    The Portuguese youth international could be a wildcard solution

    Sign up to the Liverpool.com newsletter here — it only takes a few seconds! As a player with a natural talent and with a preference for the ball to be played into feet, molding Carvalho into the Firmino role could provide Liverpool with the most dividends

    03/05/2023

    77.78% Shortened!

    Iran's interior minister said on Saturday investigators had found "suspicious samples" that were being studied

    Sickness affected more than 30 schools in at least 10 of Iran's 31 provinces on Saturday

    A gathering of parents outside an Education Ministry building in western Tehran on Saturday to protest over the illnesses turned into an anti-government demonstration, according to a video verified by Reuters

    The outbreak of schoolgirl sickness comes at a critical time for Iran's clerical rulers, who have faced months of anti-government protests sparked by the death of a young Iranian woman in the custody of the morality police who enforce strict dress codes

  • A GOOD PAYDAY FOR EPF CONTRIBUTORS

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2023/03/05/a-good-payday-for-epf-contributors

    03/05/2023, 03:07

    81.25% Shortened!

    The EPF declared a dividend rate of 5.35% for conventional savings, with a total RM45.44bil payout, as well as 4.75% for syariah savings

    In total, EPF will be paying RM51.14bil to contributors

    Economist Datuk Jalilah Baba said EPF’s dividend rate still exceeded many pundits’ expectations

    “Based on EPF’s calculations, they can still afford to give people money, so it is good news for contributors

    “This is worrying and the EPF is a fixed and reliable investment most Malaysians rely on

    “EPF has to be cautious in its investments in the current volatile market since the fund cited this as a reason for the lower gross investment returns,” she added

    ['dividend', 'fund', 'epf', 'say', 'low']

    I'm so happy for [Nelson]

    - Bournemouth's goal was 9.11 seconds into the match

    It is the Cherries' third goal in the Premier League within the first minute, and the second-fastest goal scored in league history

    - That goal was Arsenal's eighth allowed all time in the first minute of a Premier League match

    - Arsenal's three stoppage-time goals are tied for most by any team this season in the Premier League (Manchester United, Brentford)

    - Arsenal's game winner was the 119th stoppage-time goal they've scored in the Premier League, 11 more than any other team (Man United)

    The company saw a total top line of $637 million, of which $537 million was defined as ‘coal revenue.’ For the full year 2022, those numbers were $2.1 billion and $2.02 billion

    Year-over-year, coal revenue in 2022 was nearly double that of 2021

  • HOW CAN I PROTECT MY PARENTS' ASSETS FROM NURSING HOMES?

    https://finance.yahoo.com//news/protect-parents-assets-nursing-homes-140049813.html

    89.47% Shortened!

    In some cases, this can mean a health aide or other forms of in-home care

    However, often, this can mean moving into a facility such as a nursing home. The problem is that long-term care facilities are very expensive

    There are some programs that help you to pay for long-term care, but they typically do so based on need

    While Medicare typically does not pay for nursing home care, Medicaid does

    7 Steps to Help Protect Your Parent’s Assets From Nursing Homes Long-Term Care Insurance The first way to protect your or your parent’s assets is with long-term care insurance that will pay for nursing home care

    Long-term care can be very expensive, especially if you buy it later in life

    ['long', 'term', 'care', 'home', 'nursing']

    03/04/2023, 22:06

    50.0% Shortened!

    About Us Advertise KOTA TINGGI, March 4 — Minister in the Prime Minister’s Department (Law and Institutional Reform) Datuk Seri Azalina Othman Said has insisted that she was not involved in the re-appointment of Attorney General Tan Sri Idrus Harun

    She said the Attorney General is only accountable to the Prime Minister

    “I was not personally involved in the process of re-appointing the Attorney General

    “I want to stress that perhaps the Prime Minister has his own reasons for extending the Attorney General’s appointment for six more months

    Yesterday, Chief Secretary to the Government Tan Sri Mohd Zuki Ali announced the reappointment of Idrus as the Attorney General for six months effective Monday (March 6)

    “The Prime Minister, in his Budget speech recently, did mention insolvency for release from bankruptcy, and we target the release from this amendment to the Insolvency Act to benefit 130,000 individuals from 260,000 bankruptcy cases,” she said

    ['minister', 'prime', 'say', 'attorney', 'general']

    About Us Advertise KOTA TINGGI, March 4 — Minister in the Prime Minister’s Department (Law and Institutional Reform) Datuk Seri Azalina Othman Said has insisted that she was not involved in the re-appointment of Attorney General Tan Sri Idrus Harun

    She said the Attorney General is only accountable to the Prime Minister

    “I was not personally involved in the process of re-appointing the Attorney General

    “I want to stress that perhaps the Prime Minister has his own reasons for extending the Attorney General’s appointment for six more months

    Yesterday, Chief Secretary to the Government Tan Sri Mohd Zuki Ali announced the reappointment of Idrus as the Attorney General for six months effective Monday (March 6)

    “The Prime Minister, in his Budget speech recently, did mention insolvency for release from bankruptcy, and we target the release from this amendment to the Insolvency Act to benefit 130,000 individuals from 260,000 bankruptcy cases,” she said

    ['minister', 'prime', 'say', 'attorney', 'general']
