  • 12500 FREE CATHAY PACIFIC TICKETS TO HK FOR S'PORE RESIDENTS SNAPPED UP

    https://www.thestar.com.my/aseanplus/aseanplus-news/2023/03/02/12500-free-cathay-pacific-tickets-to-hk-for-spore-residents-snapped-up

    03/02/2023

    64.71% Shortened!

    Thursday, 02 Mar 2023

    The free flight giveaway for customers in Singapore is part of a larger “Hello, Hong Kong” campaign

    The giveaway for free round-trip tickets, first announced by the Hong Kong flag carrier, kicked off at noon on Thursday (March 2), and was meant to last till March 8

    The giveaway for customers in Singapore is part of a larger “Hello, Hong Kong” campaign, that was first announced by the city’s Chief Executive John Lee in early February

    The move by the Asian financial hub to woo tourists back post-pandemic includes an international, 500,000 flight ticket giveaway that has been rolled out in phases

    As was the case in Singapore, AFP had reported that Cathay Pacific’s giveaway of 17,400 round-trip tickets from Thailand to Hong Kong ended on Wednesday afternoon, despite initially being scheduled to last seven days

    ['giveaway', 'singapore', 'hong', 'kong', 'campaign']

  • AMAZON INVESTING RM25.5B TO LAUNCH INFRASTRUCTURE REGION IN MALAYSIA

    https://www.thesundaily.my/home/amazon-investing-rm255b-to-launch-infrastructure-region-in-malaysia-CG10701030

    03/02/2023

    57.14% Shortened!

    AWS vice-president of infrastructure services, Prasad Kalyanaraman, said that by launching the AWS Region in Malaysia, they are showing their commitment to customers and organisations in the country, as well as their commitment to meeting the growing demand for cloud services in Malaysia and Southeast Asia

    “We are supporting Malaysia’s digital transformation with our secure and reliable AWS cloud infrastructure

    AWS is creating an infrastructure region in Malaysia to meet the increasing demand for cloud services in Malaysia and Southeast Asia

    The new AWS region will enable customers with data residency preferences to store data in Malaysia while achieving lower latency, and at the same time serving the demand for cloud services across Southeast Asia

    Customers using AWS include Astro Malaysia Berhad, Axiata Group, Bank Islam Malaysia, CelcomDigi, Johor Corporation, PayNet, and Petroliam Nasional Berhad (Petronas)

    The new AWS region in Malaysia will consist of three Availability Zones at launch, adding to the existing 99 Availability Zones across 31 geographic regions globally

    ['service', 'aws', 'malaysia', 'region', 'customer']

    AWS vice-president of infrastructure services, Prasad Kalyanaraman, said that by launching the AWS Region in Malaysia, they are showing their commitment to customers and organisations in the country, as well as their commitment to meeting the growing demand for cloud services in Malaysia and Southeast Asia

    “We are supporting Malaysia’s digital transformation with our secure and reliable AWS cloud infrastructure

    AWS is creating an infrastructure region in Malaysia to meet the increasing demand for cloud services in Malaysia and Southeast Asia

    The new AWS region will enable customers with data residency preferences to store data in Malaysia while achieving lower latency, and at the same time serving the demand for cloud services across Southeast Asia

    Customers using AWS include Astro Malaysia Berhad, Axiata Group, Bank Islam Malaysia, CelcomDigi, Johor Corporation, PayNet, and Petroliam Nasional Berhad (Petronas)

    The new AWS region in Malaysia will consist of three Availability Zones at launch, adding to the existing 99 Availability Zones across 31 geographic regions globally

    ['service', 'aws', 'malaysia', 'region', 'customer']



  • BCORP HAS FIRST ALL-FEMALE BOARD

    https://www.thestar.com.my/business/business-news/2023/03/02/bcorp-has-first-all-female-board

    03/02/2023

    64.71% Shortened!

    Tunku Tun Aminah Sultan Ibrahim Ismail has been appointed non-executive chairman

    Tan Sri Vincent Tan will assume the role of adviser to “provide guidance to the board and support the continued growth of the group”, according to a statement released by BCorp

    Incidentally, the shake-up will see Aminah leading the all-female boardroom at BCorp, which also consists of Vincent’s daughters Nerine Tan Sheik Ping as joint chief executive officer (CEO) and executive director – joining Vivienne Cheng Chi Fan as CEO – and Chryseis Tan Sheik Ling as executive director

    Cheng joined BCorp’s board as executive director in September 2005, and was appointed as joint-CEO in April last year

    The new boardroom measures up to the group’s policy of promoting women empowerment in the company, with Vincent mentioning in BCorp’s 2022 annual report that female representation in the boardroom last year was already at 64%, exceeding the 30% recommended under the Malaysian Code on Corporate Governance

    Thank you for your report! Copyright © 1995-

    ['executive', 'bcorp', 'female', 'board', 'group']

    Tunku Tun Aminah Sultan Ibrahim Ismail has been appointed non-executive chairman

    Tan Sri Vincent Tan will assume the role of adviser to “provide guidance to the board and support the continued growth of the group”, according to a statement released by BCorp

    Incidentally, the shake-up will see Aminah leading the all-female boardroom at BCorp, which also consists of Vincent’s daughters Nerine Tan Sheik Ping as joint chief executive officer (CEO) and executive director – joining Vivienne Cheng Chi Fan as CEO – and Chryseis Tan Sheik Ling as executive director

    Cheng joined BCorp’s board as executive director in September 2005, and was appointed as joint-CEO in April last year

    The new boardroom measures up to the group’s policy of promoting women empowerment in the company, with Vincent mentioning in BCorp’s 2022 annual report that female representation in the boardroom last year was already at 64%, exceeding the 30% recommended under the Malaysian Code on Corporate Governance

    Thank you for your report! Copyright © 1995-

  • APPEALS COURT UPHOLDS JAIL SENTENCE, FINE ON FORMER UMNO DIVISION CHIEF

    https://www.thesundaily.my/local/appeals-court-upholds-jail-sentence-fine-on-former-umno-division-chief-JG10700678

    03/02/2023

    53.85% Shortened!

    “After examining the appeal record and all the evidence and reasons for the judgment by the Sessions Court, we found that the decision can be defended and there is no error by the Sessions Court that requires the intervention of the High Court and the Court of Appeal

    Therefore, the sentence by the Sessions Court is upheld and the appeal (on nine charges) is dismissed,“ said Hanipah who sat with Judges Datuk S

    On another charge of soliciting a bribe for the appointment of a company as a contractor, Judge Hanipah said the court found there was no error by the High Court judge that required the intervention of the Court of Appeal

    “The High Court judge has applied the correct legal principles to the facts of the appeal for the case

    Accordingly, the conviction and sentence by the High Court is safe, the appeal is dismissed, the decision of the High Court is upheld,“ said the judge

    On Dec 28, 2012, the Kuala Lumpur Sessions Court sentenced Abd Ghani to eight years in prison and a fine of RM977,560 before the Kuala Lumpur High Court upheld the same sentence against him

    ['court', 'appeal', 'sentence', 'abd', 'ghani']

  • 1MDB TRIAL: EX-BANKER SAYS COLLEAGUE BOASTED ABOUT MEETING NAJIB, ROBERT DE NIRO, LEONARDO DICAPRIO

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2023/03/02/1mdb-trial-ex-banker-says-colleague-boasted-about-meeting-najib-robert-de-niro-leonardo-dicaprio/57629

    03/02/2023, 19:07

    64.71% Shortened!

    Swampillai noted however that Yak may have had contact with Najib, but said he has no idea of the context of such interactions

    I did recall he did mention he did interact with Datuk Seri Najib,” the 44th prosecution witness told deputy public prosecutor Mohamad Mustaffa P

    Later when asked by Najib’s lead defence lawyer Tan Sri Muhammad Shafee Abdullah, Swampillai said Yak “bragged a lot” about people whom he had met with in the course of his work “like Datuk Seri Najib was mentioned, a number of Hollywood personalities was mentioned”

    “To be fair, I don’t think I can recall a time when Jho Low ever told me personally that he was close to Datuk Seri Najib or that he had met with or talked with Datuk Seri Najib

    As for Low’s claims to be Najib’s adviser, Swampillai confirmed he never did hear this from Low directly, but had heard about it through “second-hand” information from his superiors in the bank

    He confirmed this was why he had formed the idea that Low was Najib’s adviser

    ['yak', '1mdb', 'najib', 'swampillai', 'say']

    "Aerotrain operations were suspended since the breakdown yesterday and we made the official announcement on Thursday (March 2)

    "This happened to the first train that broke down, with the second train (sent to ferry stranded passengers) also experiencing technical difficulties

    Iskandar added that 114 passengers were stranded by the Aerotrain breakdown on Wednesday (March 1), resulting in them having to walk almost half a kilometre to the Satellite Building

    On Monday (Feb 27), an Aerotrain halted mid-way on the tracks from the KLIA Main Terminal Building to the Satellite Building

    A second train was immediately deployed for stranded passengers but it unfortunately experienced technical difficulties, resulting in passengers having to walk towards the Satellite Building

    03/02/2023, 19:07

    He applauded Philippine President Ferdinand Marcos Jr for making great strides in ensuring that the peace process in Mindanao would succeed

    “The peace process has to succeed because it not only affects the Philippines and Malaysia but also the region,” he said at a joint press briefing after holding a bilateral meeting with Marcos at Malacanang Palace here yesterday

    — Bernama Anwar said Malaysia remained committed to playing a constructive role in the peace process in Mindanao

    According to Anwar, there are immense opportunities to be reaped by both countries should efforts to attain peace in Mindanao succeed

    The Philippines, according to him, recognised the great contribution that Malaysia has made to the peace process in the southern Philippines

    He hoped the support shown by Malaysia would continue to contribute to the success of the peace process and the establishment of the Bangsamoro Autonomous Region

  • FLOODS: TWO MORE FATALITIES RECORDED IN JOHOR, DEATH TOLL NOW AT THREE

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2023/03/02/floods-two-more-fatalities-recorded-in-johor-death-toll-now-at-three

    03/02/2023, 19:07

    68.42% Shortened!

    A male and a female victim were trapped inside their own homes where their bodies were found at 11am on Thursday (March 2) morning

    “When the flood waters had receded and with information from the two victims' families, we carried out checks at the two houses along Jalan Kwongsai where we found their bodies,” he said

    On Wednesday, the first flood casualty in Johor was recorded in Kluang after a man was found dead inside a car that is believed to have been swept away by floodwaters at Jalan GSA Chamek, Paloh, near here

    “Search and rescue efforts were carried out and at 12.20pm, the car was found submerged in floodwaters

    “Upon inspecting the car, a man was found dead inside

    The body of the victim was later sent to Hospital Enche’ Besar Hajjah Khalsom in Kluang for a post-mortem,” he said

    ['flood', 'johor', 'two', 'victim', 'found']

    Man Utd are still in the hunt to win four trophies this season and the change in mentality in this squad has been impressive

    The mentality of this squad has been praised this season and Fred has credited Erik ten Hag with bringing belief to the dressing room, as well as the summer signings, especially South Americans Lisandro Martinez, Casemiro and Antony, with engineering a change in mindset

    "We bring in players with good mentality, now the players that were here before change mentality as well," he said

    I don’t know what’s different, it’s the same players, but a different mentality

    "Every moment we believe, we believe in the game, we have the mentality, it’s important to keep this to win the trophies." One of the key players in United's turnaround this season, on and off the pitch, is Fred's international teammate Casemiro

    "He won a lot of trophies in Real Madrid, he has a good mentality in the national team as well, he’s important to be a part of our squad

    https://finance.yahoo.com//news/petrobras-payout-rewards-investors-ignored-005624097.html

    62.5% Shortened!

    (Bloomberg) -- Petroleo Brasileiro SA posted a record full-year dividend in 2022, rewarding investors who stuck with Brazil’s state-controlled oil producer despite concerns about political intervention under President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva

    Most Read from Bloomberg Sorry, Twitter

    It also suggested setting aside 6.5 billion reais of the dividends in a reserve, which would need shareholder approval and reduce the dividend payout to 29.3 billion reais

    Petrobras is the second-biggest payer of dividends in the oil industry behind Saudi Aramco, according to data compiled by Bloomberg

    Petrobras was hit with a four-month oil export tax this week

    Petrobras’s fourth-quarter net income of 43.3 billion reais was up from the year-ago period, and the previous quarter on easing oil prices

    ['bloomberg', 'year', 'dividend', 'oil', 'billion']

  • 1MDB TRIAL: EX-BANK OFFICER ADMITS TO AROUND US$6MIL IN 'SECRET PROFITS'

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2023/03/02/1mdb-trial-ex-bank-officer-admits-to-around-us6mil-in-039secret-profits039

    03/02/2023, 18:07

    68.42% Shortened!

    Thursday, 02 Mar 2023

    Kevin Michael Swampillai, 59, who is the ex-head of wealth management services at BSI Bank, made the admission during examination-in-chief by Deputy Public Prosecutor Mohamad Mustaffa P

    The witness said prior to the commission, he and a subordinate, Yeo Jiawei, repeatedly asked for a pay raise from the bank but the requests fell on deaf ears

    When asked by DPP Mohamad Mustaffa what became of the money, Swampillai said he eventually “disgorged” the money to the Singaporean government when local authorities began investigations into the money he received

    Najib, 70, is on trial for 25 charges in total - four for abuse of power that allegedly brought him financial benefit to the tune of RM2.28bil; and 21 for money laundering involving the same amount of money

    Thank you for your report! Copyright © 1995-

    Thursday, 02 Mar 2023

    Kevin Michael Swampillai, 59, who is the ex-head of wealth management services at BSI Bank, made the admission during examination-in-chief by Deputy Public Prosecutor Mohamad Mustaffa P

    The witness said prior to the commission, he and a subordinate, Yeo Jiawei, repeatedly asked for a pay raise from the bank but the requests fell on deaf ears

    When asked by DPP Mohamad Mustaffa what became of the money, Swampillai said he eventually “disgorged” the money to the Singaporean government when local authorities began investigations into the money he received

    Najib, 70, is on trial for 25 charges in total - four for abuse of power that allegedly brought him financial benefit to the tune of RM2.28bil; and 21 for money laundering involving the same amount of money

  • PENANG HIGH COURT DISMISSES ASSEMBLYMEN’S BID TO STOP MOTION TO VACATE SEATS

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2023/03/02/penang-high-court-dismisses-assemblymens-bid-to-stop-motion-to-vacate-seats/57618

    03/02/2023, 18:07

    66.67% Shortened!

    About Us Advertise GEORGE TOWN, March 2 — The Penang High Court today dismissed four assemblymen’s application for an injunction to prevent the Penang state assembly from tabling a motion to vacate the seats until their appeal is heard

    Judicial Commissioner Azizan Md Arshad in his decision ruled that the courts have no power to interfere with the internal management of Parliament or any State Legislative Assembly

    Azizan further said the court has the power to grant an injunction to prevent any authority from doing something that is against the law, but at the same time, the court should also be careful not to exceed the jurisdiction given

    He said the plaintiffs had sought the court to use its discretion to prevent the duties of another body, namely the State Legislative Assembly which is also created under the State Constitution

    He said the court cannot make any decision that will exceed the jurisdiction of the court and any issue related to the eligibility or disqualification of a member of the state assembly who has been elected through a valid election process is under the jurisdiction of the State Legislative Assembly as stated in the State Constitution

    They then filed an appeal against the decision at the Court of Appeal on Jan 25

    ['court', 'assemblyman', 'state', 'assembly', 'plaintiff']

    About Us Advertise GEORGE TOWN, March 2 — The Penang High Court today dismissed four assemblymen’s application for an injunction to prevent the Penang state assembly from tabling a motion to vacate the seats until their appeal is heard

    Judicial Commissioner Azizan Md Arshad in his decision ruled that the courts have no power to interfere with the internal management of Parliament or any State Legislative Assembly

    Azizan further said the court has the power to grant an injunction to prevent any authority from doing something that is against the law, but at the same time, the court should also be careful not to exceed the jurisdiction given

    He said the plaintiffs had sought the court to use its discretion to prevent the duties of another body, namely the State Legislative Assembly which is also created under the State Constitution

    He said the court cannot make any decision that will exceed the jurisdiction of the court and any issue related to the eligibility or disqualification of a member of the state assembly who has been elected through a valid election process is under the jurisdiction of the State Legislative Assembly as stated in the State Constitution

    They then filed an appeal against the decision at the Court of Appeal on Jan 25

    ['court', 'assemblyman', 'state', 'assembly', 'plaintiff']

  • RM1 MILLION SCAM: HOW DID MAYBANK ALLOW TWO RM500,000 TRANSACTIONS WITHOUT OTP?

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2023/03/02/rm1-million-scam-how-did-maybank-allow-two-rm500000-transactions-without-otp/57609

    03/02/2023, 17:09

    72.73% Shortened!

    After getting in touch with both Maybank and Celcom on Monday, Celcom reimbursed the RM1 million to the victim the next day

    He questions how is it possible to transfer such a large amount without requiring OTP and no notification was sent to the user

    For individuals, customers can transfer up to RM50,000 per day while business accounts can transfer up to RM100,000 per day

    However, it is mentioned that a customer may have the flexibility to enjoy a higher transfer limit based on the total investable asset with the bank

    Typically, Maybank would require an OTP or Secure2U transaction if funds are transferred to a new 3rd party or mule account

    OTP typically isn’t required if the transfer is made to a saved account or biller on Maybank2u

    ['maybank', 'call', 'fund', 'transfer', 'victim']

    After getting in touch with both Maybank and Celcom on Monday, Celcom reimbursed the RM1 million to the victim the next day

    He questions how is it possible to transfer such a large amount without requiring OTP and no notification was sent to the user

    For individuals, customers can transfer up to RM50,000 per day while business accounts can transfer up to RM100,000 per day

    However, it is mentioned that a customer may have the flexibility to enjoy a higher transfer limit based on the total investable asset with the bank

    Typically, Maybank would require an OTP or Secure2U transaction if funds are transferred to a new 3rd party or mule account

    OTP typically isn’t required if the transfer is made to a saved account or biller on Maybank2u

    ['maybank', 'call', 'fund', 'transfer', 'victim']

  • LTAT TO PRIVATISE BOUSTEAD AT 85.5 SEN PER SHARE

    https://www.thestar.com.my/business/business-news/2023/03/02/ltat-to-take-boustead-private-at-855-sen-per-share

    03/02/2023, 17:07

    60.0% Shortened!

    In a statement, the armed forces pension fund, which holds a 59.42% interest in Boustead, said the offer is conditional upon the Minister of Finance's approval upon Bank Negara's recommendation and approval under Section 87 of the Financial Services Act 2013 and Section 99 of the Islamic Financial Services Act 2013 to allow it to acquire up to 100% equity interest in Boustead

    LTAT noted that the the offer is not conditional upon any minimal level of acceptance as it owns more than 50% of the voting shares in the company

    "The Offer represents a significant step for LTAT in taking Boustead private allowing for, greater flexibility for LTAT to implement the turnaround plan for Boustead as part of its objective in ensuring the sustainability of the fund for the Malaysian Armed Forces and veterans, in line with LTAT's on-going transformation plan," said the fund

    It added that it presently does not have any plan to dismiss or make redundant any of the employees of Boustead group as a direct consequence of the Offer

    As LTAT already has statutory control over Boustead, the offer will not result in any mandatory offer to acquire the remaining voting shares in Affin Bank, Boustead Plantations Bhd, Boustead Heavy Industries Corp Bhd and Pharmaniaga Bhd it does not already own

    In a filing with Bursa Malaysia, Boustead said LTAT does not intend to maintain the listing status of Boustead

    ['ltat', 'conditional', 'offer', 'boustead', 'bhd']

  • EX-BSI BANKER ADMITS AND REGRETS POCKETING US$ 6 MIL IN SECRET COMMISSION

    https://www.theedgemarkets.com/node/657505

    03/02/2023, 16:09

    66.67% Shortened!

    I received benefit totalling almost US$6 million," he said.  In October 2020, the Monetary Authority of Singapore (MAS) issued lifetime Prohibition Orders (POs) against Kevin for his role in the 1MDB scandal that saw him receive US$5 million in “secret profits”

    MAS said that Kevin, along with his subordinate Yeo Jiawei, had assisted 1MDB to restructure several of its joint venture interests

    In the course of this, Kevin and Yeo had channelled a portion of the fund management fees or “secret profits” to an entity beneficially owned by Kevin

    At the trial on Thursday (March 2), Kevin explained further that he and Yeo Jiawei were not getting commissions which other bank officers were getting from certain 1MDB transactions

    Neither was I offered a deal by law enforcements investigating 1MDB,” Kevin said.  The only accused in the trial is former prime minister Datuk Seri Najib Abdul Razak

    The Edge is covering the trial live here

    ['edge', '1mdb', 'kevin', 'trial', 'yeo']

    The two Executive Directors are Norlela Baharudin and Chryseis Tan Sheik Ling, the daughter of Tan

    BCorp has been in operation since 1984 and has shown strong growth

  • NAZRI AZIZ TO US ON MISSION TO HELP RESET MALAYSIA'S IMAGE

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2023/03/02/nazri-aziz-to-us-on-mission-to-help-reset-malaysia039s-image

    03/02/2023, 15:09

    75.0% Shortened!

    "I feel there is much to do in my mission in the US, especially in bringing up and cleaning the image of Malaysia which was dented due to the 1MDB scandal

    This issue has put Malaysia in a bad light," he told Bernama in an exclusive interview recently

    In resetting Malaysia’s image in the US, Nazri also wants to address other issues that remained a point of contention in the US-Malaysia ties especially the human rights issue involving foreign workers in Malaysia

    Finding ways to improve Malaysia's Tier 3 ranking in the US Trafficking in Persons (TIP) report released in 2022 will also be his priority as it has placed Malaysia at a disadvantaged position

    "Of course, my aim is to improve the ranking of Malaysia to Tier 2 and gradually to Tier 1 under (US) watchlist...we aim for the highest," he said

    Bilateral ties between Malaasia and the US were established upon Malaya’s independence in 1957, with the US being currently Malaysia's third largest global trade partner and export destination, while Malaysia is the US' 17th largest trade partner

    ['malaysia', 'nazri', 'say', 'scandal', 'malaysian']

  • FREE EDUCATION, EQUAL RIGHTS FOR UNMARRIED WOMEN AMONG PROPOSALS TO BOOST CHINA'S FERTILITY

    https://www.channelnewsasia.com/asia/free-college-education-equal-rights-unmarried-women-boost-chinas-fertility-declining-birth-rate-3318276

    03/02/2023

    68.42% Shortened!

    The once-a-year gathering mostly overlaps with the National People's Congress (NPC), where a new leadership team under President Xi Jinping will be endorsed.  China should remove restrictions on marital status used to register newborns, allowing unmarried women to enjoy fertility services like married women do, Xie Wenmin, a member of China's top political advisory body, told the state-backed Global Times this week

    Much of China's demographic downturn is the result of its one-child policy imposed between 1980 and 2015

    Last year, China recorded its lowest ever birth rate, of 6.77 births per 1,000 people

    Jilin in northeastern China, which has one of the lowest birth rates in the country, modified its rules in 2002 to permit single women to access in vitro fertilisation (IVF) but it has had little impact as it is still banned nationally under the country's National Health Commission

    Lu Weiying, a member of China's top political advisory body, told the Global Times this week she would propose allowing unmarried women to access egg freezing to preserve their fertility and include infertility treatments in the public health insurance system

    Currently IVF and egg freezing in China are banned for unmarried women.

    ['woman', 'unmarried', 'member', 'china', 'top']

    The once-a-year gathering mostly overlaps with the National People's Congress (NPC), where a new leadership team under President Xi Jinping will be endorsed.  China should remove restrictions on marital status used to register newborns, allowing unmarried women to enjoy fertility services like married women do, Xie Wenmin, a member of China's top political advisory body, told the state-backed Global Times this week

    Much of China's demographic downturn is the result of its one-child policy imposed between 1980 and 2015

    Last year, China recorded its lowest ever birth rate, of 6.77 births per 1,000 people

    Jilin in northeastern China, which has one of the lowest birth rates in the country, modified its rules in 2002 to permit single women to access in vitro fertilisation (IVF) but it has had little impact as it is still banned nationally under the country's National Health Commission

    Lu Weiying, a member of China's top political advisory body, told the Global Times this week she would propose allowing unmarried women to access egg freezing to preserve their fertility and include infertility treatments in the public health insurance system

    Currently IVF and egg freezing in China are banned for unmarried women.

    ['woman', 'unmarried', 'member', 'china', 'top']

    Asked by Shafee, Swampillai confirmed he did the same things as Yeo did

    Swampillai agreed that he would also be found guilty of the same offences of cheating and money-laundering as Yeo if he had also been charged in court

    But Swampillai pointed out that he had never been arrested and that he was never charged in court in relation to the 1MDB matter

    Swampillai said this is “news to me” when Shafee suggested that there were actually tentative papers prepared for charges against him

    Commuters walk past a banner with Indian Prime Minister's Narendra Modi's photograph welcoming delegates of G20 foreign ministers meeting, in New Delhi, India, on Mar 1, 2023

    "We are meeting at a time of deep global divisions ..

    But EU foreign policy chief Josep Borrell said he was confident India would use the meeting to "make Russia understand that this war has to finish"

    Borrell will meet on the sidelines of the New Delhi summit with Chinese Foreign Minister Qin Gang, where he will seek assurances that Beijing will not lend support to Russia's war effort

    The last time Blinken and Lavrov were in the same room, at a G20 meeting in Bali last July, the latter stormed out according to Western officials

    While India has not condemned the Ukraine invasion, Prime Minister Narendra Modi told Putin last year that this was "not a time for war" in comments seen as a rebuke to Moscow

    https://www.thestar.com.my/sport/badminton/2023/03/02/the-older-the-wiser

    03/02/2023, 13:07

    70.0% Shortened!

    “So, it’s important for the coaches to be patient and give the players a second chance to prove their worth,” said Ewe Hock

    Ewe Hock is also concerned about the development of players when they are promoted to the senior squad

    “Many talented players are unable to produce good results when they reach senior level

    Ewe Hock himself is trying to play his part in identifying talented players by organising a local tournament called the Ong Ewe Hock Challenge Trophy

    “Penang has a rich tradition of producing top players for the country such as Chong Wei, mixed doubles player Chan Peng Soon and women’s singles shuttler Goh Jin Wei

    “I am also from Penang and I want to help identify talented players from my state through this tournament,” said Ewe Hock at the launching ceremony yesterday.

  • NEW MSAP MAY WEIGH ON TM'S EARNINGS, BUT BENEFITS RAKYAT, SAYS MINISTER

    https://www.theedgemarkets.com/node/657482

    03/02/2023, 13:07

    53.85% Shortened!

    However, the minister believes that Telekom Malaysia Bhd (TM) is able to “bounce back” after the initial setback by MSAP, based on the group’s historical net profit between 2017 to 2022

    Fahmi noted that although TM incurred a net loss of RM260.5 million in 2018 when MSAP was implemented, the group posted a net profit of RM557.4 million a year later in 2019, and had continued to trend upwards to RM1.14 billion in 2022

    I believe TM may record a little loss in the early stage [of MSAP implementation], but it can benefit the people,” he told Dewan Rakyat on Thursday (March 2)

    Fahmi was responding to Khoo Poay Tiong [DAP-Kota Melaka], who asked for an explanation regarding the new Mandatory Standard on Access Pricing (MSAP) and the impact on the telecommunications sector and users in Malaysia in terms of the quality of service

    Citing wholesale high-speed broadband services as example, Fahmi said in general, prices set in the new MSAP are lower compared to the previous one

    “High Speed Broadband or HSBB for a speed of 100 Mbps in the new MSAP for the year 2023 is RM254.64 per month compared to the previous price of RM515 per month,” he said

    ['search', 'edge', 'malaysia', 'speed', 'fahmi']

    However, the minister believes that Telekom Malaysia Bhd (TM) is able to “bounce back” after the initial setback by MSAP, based on the group’s historical net profit between 2017 to 2022

    Fahmi noted that although TM incurred a net loss of RM260.5 million in 2018 when MSAP was implemented, the group posted a net profit of RM557.4 million a year later in 2019, and had continued to trend upwards to RM1.14 billion in 2022

    I believe TM may record a little loss in the early stage [of MSAP implementation], but it can benefit the people,” he told Dewan Rakyat on Thursday (March 2)

    Fahmi was responding to Khoo Poay Tiong [DAP-Kota Melaka], who asked for an explanation regarding the new Mandatory Standard on Access Pricing (MSAP) and the impact on the telecommunications sector and users in Malaysia in terms of the quality of service

    Citing wholesale high-speed broadband services as example, Fahmi said in general, prices set in the new MSAP are lower compared to the previous one

    “High Speed Broadband or HSBB for a speed of 100 Mbps in the new MSAP for the year 2023 is RM254.64 per month compared to the previous price of RM515 per month,” he said

  • ‘SAME PROGRAMMES, BUT NEW LABEL’: MEDICAL OFFICER, SELANGOR

    https://codeblue.galencentre.org/2023/03/02/same-programmes-but-new-label-medical-officer-selangor/

    03/02/2023, 13:07

    88.24% Shortened!

    KUALA LUMPUR, March 2 — A primary care medical officer (MO) serving at a public health clinic in Selangor attributes staff shortages to the large number of programmes run by the Ministry of Health (MOH)

    Too Many Programmes, But Too Few Staff Personally, I think we need more staff because we are running multiple programmes

    If you have an adequate number of staff working, it reduces the burden and stress

    We have to have a strong number of staff, and we need to have strength when we want to raise awareness and when we want to give the best treatment to the community.  I think everybody in MOH has very good intentions to bring the best and spread good things to the community and to deliver the best health care service in the community

    Is it adequate with all the programmes that they are running and that they are planning to run in the future? Then they start to consider everything because we don’t want medical doctors only, we want specialist consultants in the health care system, in the government service

    They want to become doctors because they want to contribute to the community

    ['programme', 'staff', 'health', 'number', 'doctor']

    KUALA LUMPUR, March 2 — A primary care medical officer (MO) serving at a public health clinic in Selangor attributes staff shortages to the large number of programmes run by the Ministry of Health (MOH)

    Too Many Programmes, But Too Few Staff Personally, I think we need more staff because we are running multiple programmes

    If you have an adequate number of staff working, it reduces the burden and stress

    We have to have a strong number of staff, and we need to have strength when we want to raise awareness and when we want to give the best treatment to the community.  I think everybody in MOH has very good intentions to bring the best and spread good things to the community and to deliver the best health care service in the community

    Is it adequate with all the programmes that they are running and that they are planning to run in the future? Then they start to consider everything because we don’t want medical doctors only, we want specialist consultants in the health care system, in the government service

    They want to become doctors because they want to contribute to the community

    ['programme', 'staff', 'health', 'number', 'doctor']

  • A FAMILY FEUD, GRUESOME ‘KILL ROOM’, AND POTS OF ‘HUMAN SOUP’: HOW THE MURDER OF ABBY CHOI SHOCKED HONG KONG

    https://www.independent.co.uk/asia/china/abby-choi-murder-hong-kong-family-husband-alex-kwong-b2292511.html

    03/02/2023, 12:07

    92.94% Shortened!

    On 27 February, Hong Kong police charged 28-year-old Alex Kwong with the gruesome murder of his ex-wife, along with his father Kwong Kau, 65, and older brother Anthony Kwong, 31

    Choi and Alex Kwong were married in 2012, when she was only 18 years old and he was roughly the same age

    Though paid for by Choi, it had been registered in the name of Alex Kwong's father Kwong Kau, allegedly in order to avoid nearly $8m Hong Kong dollars (US$1m) in stamp duty

    Kwong Kau is a former Hong Kong police sergeant who retired from the force in 2005, having received a medal for long service in 2001

    Police loads the refrigerator that is suspected of having been used to keep body parts of Abby Choi Police say that Mr Kwong went to ground in a luxury flat in the Arch Sky Tower in central Hong Kong, allegedly rented by Ms Ng

    Hong Kong police officers comb through garbage for the remains of murdered model Abby Choi on 28 February 2023 Despite its long history of organised crime, modern Hong Kong has one of the lowest murder rates on earth, with between 0.2 and 0.9 homicides per 100,000 people every year according to the World Bank

  • PM ANWAR: MALAYSIA TO SEE GREATER INCREASE IN DIGITAL TRANSFORMATION FROM LATEST AMAZON INVESTMENT

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2023/03/02/pm-anwar-malaysia-to-see-greater-increase-in-digital-transformation-from-latest-amazon-investment/57556

    03/02/2023, 12:07

    60.0% Shortened!

    About Us Advertise KUALA LUMPUR, March 2 ― Malaysia is expected to see a greater increase in digital transformation and digital trust in society, driven by the new investment from Amazon Web Services (AWS) worth RM25.5 billion over 15 years for a new infrastructure “region” in Malaysia

    “Today’s announcement is a vote of confidence and support for Malaysia's leadership in the global digital economy, and we look forward to deepening our collaboration with AWS to advance our nation’s digital economy ambitions,” he said in a recorded speech at the AWS Malaysia Cloud Day here today

    For these companies, Anwar said an AWS Region in Malaysia will further accelerate the transformation and the creation of innovative digital services, using the secure, high-performing, resilient, and trusted infrastructure

    The digital economy's contribution to the national gross domestic product (GDP) stood at 23.2 per cent in 2021

    “Our goal of increasing the digital economy contribution to 25.5 per cent of Malaysia's GDP can be reached well by 2025

    This is possible through public and private sector investments in digital infrastructure, human capital, business capacities, and improved public service delivery,” he said

    ['malaysia', 'digital', 'service', 'aws', 'say']

    About Us Advertise KUALA LUMPUR, March 2 ― Malaysia is expected to see a greater increase in digital transformation and digital trust in society, driven by the new investment from Amazon Web Services (AWS) worth RM25.5 billion over 15 years for a new infrastructure “region” in Malaysia

    “Today’s announcement is a vote of confidence and support for Malaysia's leadership in the global digital economy, and we look forward to deepening our collaboration with AWS to advance our nation’s digital economy ambitions,” he said in a recorded speech at the AWS Malaysia Cloud Day here today

    For these companies, Anwar said an AWS Region in Malaysia will further accelerate the transformation and the creation of innovative digital services, using the secure, high-performing, resilient, and trusted infrastructure

    The digital economy's contribution to the national gross domestic product (GDP) stood at 23.2 per cent in 2021

    “Our goal of increasing the digital economy contribution to 25.5 per cent of Malaysia's GDP can be reached well by 2025

    This is possible through public and private sector investments in digital infrastructure, human capital, business capacities, and improved public service delivery,” he said

    Tesla is doing good things in AI," he said

    Musk paused, then sighed

  • BLINKEN, LAVROV SPEAK AMID WAR OF WORDS OVER UKRAINE AT G20 MEET

    https://www.channelnewsasia.com/world/blinken-lavrov-g20-spoke-briefly-amid-war-ukraine-3319366

    03/02/2023

    81.25% Shortened!

    US Secretary of State Antony Blinken and Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov

    US Secretary of State Antony Blinken told Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov to end the war and urged Moscow to reverse its suspension of the New START nuclear treaty, a senior US official said

    The Russian foreign ministry said Lavrov and Blinken spoke "on the move" for less than 10 minutes at the end of the closed-door session, and did not engage in any negotiations, Russian news agencies reported

    Blinken later told a news conference he had told Lavrov to engage in diplomacy during the unscheduled encounter

    Russia's Lavrov, however, blamed the West for global political and economic crises

    India has declined to blame Russia for the war and has sought a diplomatic solution while boosting its purchases of Russian oil

    ['state', 'russian', 'foreign', 'minister', 'russia']

    03/02/2023, 10:08

    64.71% Shortened!

    His point was the Liverpool defender’s excellence underpinned the heroics of last season AND a Holland World Cup run, but he could easily have merely said wait and see…because Van Dijk had the perfect answer here at Anfield

    It was hardly a classic goal, Jose Sa feebly patting van Dijk’s initial header from a corner straight to Diogo Jota, who tapped the ball back to the big Dutchman to nod home on 73 minutes, but memorable for its impact

    Just how important will ultimately be judged if they finish in the top four or not, but given the lack of confidence Liverpool displayed at times here, you wonder whether a draw would have killed any hope of catching Spurs

    That seemed a long way away when Darwin Nunez had a goal ruled out for Jota’s foul on Max Kilman on 66 minutes, which seemed to sum up the home side’s luck

    Liverpool could argue that Jota had been pushed into Kilman, and so at least deserved a penalty, and there is some truth in that, but there was no way referee Paul Tierney was ever going to offer such a radical interpretation

  • RINGGIT EXTENDS GAINS AGAINST GREENBACK

    https://www.thestar.com.my/business/business-news/2023/03/02/ringgit-extends-gains-against-greenback

    03/02/2023, 10:07

    53.85% Shortened!

    Bank Muamalat Malaysia Bhd head of economics and market analysis Mohd Afzanizam Abdul Rashid said one of the voting members for the US Federal Open Market Committee (FOMC), Neil Kashkari, indicated that he was open to a 25 basis points hike (bps) or 50 bps in the upcoming meeting in March

    Similarly, non-voting member Raphel Bostic suggested the Fed funds rate should be in the range of 5.00 per cent to 5.25 per cent, and that such a level needs to be held steady well into 2024

    As such, Mohd Afzanizam foresees the ringgit to remain rangebound against the greenback ahead of the FOMC meeting in mid-March

    The ringgit also traded higher against some Asean currencies

    Mohd Afzanizam Abdul Rashid

    Thank you for your report! Copyright © 1995-

    Leong Hup is currently trading at an attractive FY24F PER of 5.5x, compared to its 2BUY call on Leong year historical average PER of 11.5x," said MIDF in a note

    The research firm maintained its target price on the share at 90 sen a share

    Leong Hup saw net profit in the fourth quarter ended Dec 31, 2022, more than double to RM90.7mil from RM38mil it had registered in the same quarter of 2021

    During the quarter under review, Leong Hup's feedmill division's sales volume grew 5% year-on-year to 676,400 metric tonnes, while the utilisation rate increased 2.1ppt to 63.9%

  • WE HAVE SURPLUS EGGS NOW

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2023/03/02/we-have-surplus-eggs-now

    03/02/2023, 09:07

    72.73% Shortened!

    Datuk Seri Mohamad Sabu said the decision to import eggs was because of low production between October and December last year

    In the first two months of this year, however, a total of 2.4 billion eggs were produced, said Mohamad

    He said it was the only company permitted to import eggs

    However, Mohamad’s written reply did not mention the name of the company

    According to figures, a total of 13.4 billion eggs were produced in Malaysia in 2018, 10.9 billion in 2019 and 12.9 billion in 2020

    In 2021, a total of 13.6 billion were produced while last year, the egg production was at 13.3 billion.

    ['mohamad', 'say', 'egg', 'year', 'import']

    “If the company deteriorates further, there could be a massive disruption to the supply of medicines and drugs to the public healthcare system.” He said the situation affecting Pharmaniaga exposes vulnerabilities in the public healthcare sector’s pharmaceutical procurement processes and highlights the need to undertake urgent reforms

    This represents more than a third of the government’s branded and generic drug and medicine supply

    Pharmaniaga also has the logistics and distribution contract for these medicines

    It will introduce improved diversity of suppliers and reduce vulnerability.” However, Azrul does not think that Pharmaniaga’s PN17 classification would cause any disruption of public healthcare sector services

    But the situation could change rapidly if its financial situation does not improve within the next year, he added

    “It could also provide a government guarantee, which Pharmaniaga could rely on to facilitate financial arrangements or obtain credit from banks or other financial institutions,” he said

    Russia's aim was to "subjugate, re-educate or kill Ukrainian civic leaders and ordinary dissenters", the team said

    Russian forces are under pressure to secure advances now, before warmer weather brings the region's season of sucking black mud - "bezdorizhzhia" in Ukrainian, "raputitsa" in Russian - legendary in military history for destroying armies attempting to attack across Ukraine and western Russia

    Five assists to add to that tally is proof of Casemiro's growing influence going forward, and the midfielder so famed for his defensive efforts detailed his evolution into the new role under United boss Erik ten Hag

    “Every player has their role, maybe here [at United] I have got more of a creative role,” Casemiro told United Review

    “That's what's most important in my role

    Of course, goals and assists are important and make everyone happy, but the role of the defensive central midfielder today is the one I've just described.” With a four-year contract penned upon his arrival last summer, Casemiro, 31, will continue to evolve at United well into his 30s

    The Brazilian has enjoyed much more attacking freedom since joining Man United last summer Sign up for our daily newsletter to get the day's biggest stories sent direct to your inbox We have more newsletters Casemiro believes he has been given more creative responsibility at Manchester United compared to his long spell at Real Madrid

    Five assists to add to that tally is proof of Casemiro's growing influence going forward, and the midfielder so famed for his defensive efforts detailed his evolution into the new role under United boss Erik ten Hag

    “Every player has their role, maybe here [at United] I have got more of a creative role,” Casemiro told United Review

    “That's what's most important in my role

    Of course, goals and assists are important and make everyone happy, but the role of the defensive central midfielder today is the one I've just described.” With a four-year contract penned upon his arrival last summer, Casemiro, 31, will continue to evolve at United well into his 30s

    READ NEXT Erik ten Hag faces biggest rotation test with United squad How United should line up vs West Ham in FA Cup fixture Erik ten Hag gives update on Anthony Martial injury situation Gary Neville disagrees with United coach over team's performance United stance on Wout Weghorst and Marcel Sabitzer futures

    ['united', 'casemiro', 'erik', 'ten', 'hag']

  • PENANG AIRPORT EXPANSION THIS YEAR

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2023/03/02/penang-airport-expansion-this-year

    03/02/2023, 09:07

    73.91% Shortened!

    “In building any airport, there is a process that involves getting an aerodrome licence

    The question of whether Kulim International Airport (KXP) will replace Penang International Airport (PIA) has been a major infrastructure question playing in the minds of investors since 2015 at least

    The speculation came to an end in Parliament recently and Loke, who was in Penang yesterday, sealed KXP’s fate after confirming that the expansion and upgrading of PIA would begin by the end of this year

    Loke said the Federal Government sees the PIA expansion project as an urgent need for the state as the current capacity of the airport has exceeded its actual capacity of 6.5 million passengers a year

    Loke added that the upgrading and expansion project will only involve MAHB’s existing land and will not involve any land reclamation or acquisition

    When asked about the planned Kulim International Airport, Loke said there were no applications made by the Kedah government for any aerodrome licence.

    ['international', 'airport', 'penang', 'say', 'loke']

    “In building any airport, there is a process that involves getting an aerodrome licence

    The question of whether Kulim International Airport (KXP) will replace Penang International Airport (PIA) has been a major infrastructure question playing in the minds of investors since 2015 at least

    The speculation came to an end in Parliament recently and Loke, who was in Penang yesterday, sealed KXP’s fate after confirming that the expansion and upgrading of PIA would begin by the end of this year

    Loke said the Federal Government sees the PIA expansion project as an urgent need for the state as the current capacity of the airport has exceeded its actual capacity of 6.5 million passengers a year

    Loke added that the upgrading and expansion project will only involve MAHB’s existing land and will not involve any land reclamation or acquisition

    When asked about the planned Kulim International Airport, Loke said there were no applications made by the Kedah government for any aerodrome licence.

    ['international', 'airport', 'penang', 'say', 'loke']

    03/02/2023, 08:09

    80.65% Shortened!

    Chay, who is also the secretary of the Cameron Highlands Vegetable Growers Association, predicts that vegetable supply will be low in the coming month, causing prices to rise

    The federation also responded to the Consumers Association of Penang’s (CAP) comments about exorbitant vegetable price increases

    “Consumers should understand that the weather patterns, vegetable prices and production are closely related,” Chay said

    “If we don’t, the vegetable supply and prices will be affected more severely, especially when the Ramadan fasting month and Hari Raya Aidilfitri come,” he said

    While vegetable prices fluctuate from time to time, Lim said vegetable farmers had been facing rising production costs for a long time

    “When vegetable output is high and prices are low, farmers have no choice but to bear all the losses

  • 'NAJIB HAD TO BE AWARE OF FLOW OF 1MDB FUNDS'

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2023/03/02/najib-had-to-be-aware-of-flow-of-1mdb-funds

    03/02/2023, 08:09

    70.0% Shortened!

    Reading his witness statement, Swampillai said SRC International had initiated the use of fiduciary funds in 2011

    “Within a fairly short period of time, these fiduciary fund transactions were also undertaken by various related and affiliated companies, such as 1MDB, Brazen Sky Ltd and Aabar BVI, which also became clients of BSI,” he said

    Investments in fiduciary funds are often directed by the investor (client), and the fund manager’s role is to carry out the client’s instructions by implementing those instructions

    This is unlike traditional investment funds, where investments are decided and managed by the fund managers on a discretionary basis

    The witness also said the origins of the use of such fiduciary funds by companies such as 1MDB, SRC, Brazen Sky and Aabar could be traced back to a meeting he had in 2011 with fugitive businessman, Low Taek Jho, or better known as Jho Low, who had inquired about the inner workings of fiduciary funds with BSI

    He said Low had told BSI on numerous occasions that he was an adviser to Najib, which Swampillai had heard from his superiors

    ['najib', 'fund', '1mdb', 'company', 'fiduciary']

    Reading his witness statement, Swampillai said SRC International had initiated the use of fiduciary funds in 2011

    “Within a fairly short period of time, these fiduciary fund transactions were also undertaken by various related and affiliated companies, such as 1MDB, Brazen Sky Ltd and Aabar BVI, which also became clients of BSI,” he said

    Investments in fiduciary funds are often directed by the investor (client), and the fund manager’s role is to carry out the client’s instructions by implementing those instructions

    This is unlike traditional investment funds, where investments are decided and managed by the fund managers on a discretionary basis

    The witness also said the origins of the use of such fiduciary funds by companies such as 1MDB, SRC, Brazen Sky and Aabar could be traced back to a meeting he had in 2011 with fugitive businessman, Low Taek Jho, or better known as Jho Low, who had inquired about the inner workings of fiduciary funds with BSI

    He said Low had told BSI on numerous occasions that he was an adviser to Najib, which Swampillai had heard from his superiors

    ['najib', 'fund', '1mdb', 'company', 'fiduciary']

  • RAMP UP ENGLISH LANGUAGE PROGRAMMES TO STAY ON TARGET

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2023/03/02/ramp-up-english-language-programmes-to-stay-on-target

    03/02/2023, 08:08

    83.78% Shortened!

    With two years left until the completion of the Education Ministry’s Roadmap for English Language Education in Malaysia (2015-2025) reform plan, stakeholders say more needs to be done

    “However, more dual language programme schools need to open up for the English language to be applied even more in the classroom,” she said yesterday

    Jobs, she said, required skills, and having a command of the English language was an asset to any potential employer

    The Highly Immersive Programme is specified in the Malaysia Education Blueprint 2015-2025 and is aimed at solving the poor language proficiency problem among students by involving and immersing them in an English language environment

    “Just strictly enforce the immersive and dual language programme, where students can opt for Mathematics and Science in English, and the level of English education will be enhanced,” Mak added

    “The English language requirement in the job market depends on the company’s needs; some don’t stress having fluency in English, but of course, a strong grasp of the language is still seen as an extra advantage,” she said

    ['english', 'language', 'education', 'proficiency', 'student']

    With two years left until the completion of the Education Ministry’s Roadmap for English Language Education in Malaysia (2015-2025) reform plan, stakeholders say more needs to be done

    “However, more dual language programme schools need to open up for the English language to be applied even more in the classroom,” she said yesterday

    Jobs, she said, required skills, and having a command of the English language was an asset to any potential employer

    The Highly Immersive Programme is specified in the Malaysia Education Blueprint 2015-2025 and is aimed at solving the poor language proficiency problem among students by involving and immersing them in an English language environment

    “Just strictly enforce the immersive and dual language programme, where students can opt for Mathematics and Science in English, and the level of English education will be enhanced,” Mak added

    “The English language requirement in the job market depends on the company’s needs; some don’t stress having fluency in English, but of course, a strong grasp of the language is still seen as an extra advantage,” she said

    ['english', 'language', 'education', 'proficiency', 'student']

  • MO SALAH IS LOOKING SHARP AGAIN JUST IN TIME TO SAVE LIVERPOOL'S SEASON

    https://www.dailymail.co.uk/sport/football/article-11811787/Mo-Salah-looking-sharp-just-time-help-Jurgen-Klopps-try-save-season.html

    03/02/2023

    79.31% Shortened!

    Salah stuck out his right thigh to give Liverpool three important points in the pursuit of the top four then hared away, roaring his relief

    To reach 20 once again, Salah now stands alongside Ian Rush, Gordon Hodgson and Roger Hunt

    Mohamed Salah's 20th goal of the season boosted Liverpool's hopes of a top four finish Salah is rapidly closing in on a place in the top five in Liverpool's all-time scoring chart Liverpool captain Jordan Henderson, right, has described Salah as a immaculate professional Robbie Fowler (183) and Steven Gerrard (186) are the next figures whom Salah will leapfrog – already this season he has usurped Michael Owen and Sir Kenny Dalglish – and, when he does, he will have a place in the top five

    The importance of this game cannot be underestimated if Liverpool, somehow, are going to finish in the top four

    The perception around Salah this season is that he has taken it easier, having signed a new contract last July – the biggest Liverpool have ever awarded to a player

    If Salah is out of form with 20 goals, what is he going to be like when he really starts playing well? Liverpool are going to need every big character playing at maximum capacity for the next three months to reach the positions they want to be and Salah is firmly in that bracket

    ['time', 'salah', 'score', 'liverpool', 'goal']

  • THREE MECHANICS NABBED FOR BLOWING OPEN ATM IN RM300,000 HEIST

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2023/03/02/three-mechanics-nabbed-for-blowing-open-atm-in-rm300000-heist

    03/02/2023

    72.73% Shortened!

    Thursday, 02 Mar 2023

    Selangor police chief Comm Datuk Hussein Omar Khan said following the incident on Feb 23, police conducted several raids in Kuang and Meru and arrested three men

    "The mastermind for the group is a 43-year-old man who works as a mechanic in Kuang," he told reporters at the Selangor police headquarters on Thursday (March 2)

    "The suspects are believed to have bored a hole in the machine and pumped it with oxy-acetylene gas

    "Once they pumped enough gas in the machine, they would ignite it in order to blow open the machine," he said, adding that the notes in the machine were believed to have been sprayed with ink during the incident

    One ATM was successfully opened while another was not

    ['police', 'three', 'open', 'machine', 'atm']

    03/02/2023

    53.85% Shortened!

    By Yasin Ebrahim Investing.com -- The Dow closed flat Wednesday, as Treasury yields continued to advance on signs the disinflation in goods has run out of steam suggesting that the Fed's rate-hike path may be steeper than expected.  The Dow Jones Industrial Average gained 0.02%, or 5 points, and S&P 500 fell 0.46%, and the Nasdaq Composite was down 0.66%

    The February ISM Manufacturing PMI rose to 47.7 from 47.4, but a deeper dive into the data showed fresh signs of price pressures

    The 10-year Treasury yield topped 4% for the first since November, keeping tech stocks in the firing line and extending the slump seen in February

  • TOILET PAPER ADDING TO 'FOREVER CHEMICALS' IN WASTEWATER, STUDY SHOWS

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/life/2023/03/02/toilet-paper-adding-to-forever-chemicals-in-wastewater-study-shows/57511

    03/02/2023, 08:07

    53.33% Shortened!

    “Forever chemicals”, or PFAS, are found in cosmetics, non-stick cookware and waterproof clothing

    The synthetic chemicals are present in soil and waterways across the globe, and a new study yesterday found that toilet paper “should be considered as a potentially major source” of PFAS in wastewater treatment systems

    The researchers said reducing PFAS in wastewater is “critical”, since the chemicals are potentially harmful

    Some manufacturers add PFAS when converting wood into pulp, traces of which may contaminate the final toilet paper product

    Recycled toilet paper may also be made with fibres that come from materials containing PFAS, said the study

    They found that toilet paper contributed about four per cent of diPAPs in the United States and Canada, 35 per cent in Sweden and up to 89 per cent in France

    The study looked at toilet paper samples collected from November 2021 to August 2022

    ['toilet', 'paper', 'chemical', 'wastewater', 'study']

    “Forever chemicals”, or PFAS, are found in cosmetics, non-stick cookware and waterproof clothing

    The synthetic chemicals are present in soil and waterways across the globe, and a new study yesterday found that toilet paper “should be considered as a potentially major source” of PFAS in wastewater treatment systems

    The researchers said reducing PFAS in wastewater is “critical”, since the chemicals are potentially harmful

    Some manufacturers add PFAS when converting wood into pulp, traces of which may contaminate the final toilet paper product

    Recycled toilet paper may also be made with fibres that come from materials containing PFAS, said the study

    They found that toilet paper contributed about four per cent of diPAPs in the United States and Canada, 35 per cent in Sweden and up to 89 per cent in France

    The study looked at toilet paper samples collected from November 2021 to August 2022

    ['toilet', 'paper', 'chemical', 'wastewater', 'study']



  • PROPOSED LUXURY GOODS TAX WOULD NOT IMPACT TOURISM SPENDING: ECONOMIST

    https://www.thesundaily.my/local/proposed-luxury-goods-tax-would-not-impact-tourism-spending-economist-JO10698526

    03/02/2023, 08:07

    77.78% Shortened!

    He said the luxury goods tax is mostly targeted at locals who buy high-end products

    “I don’t believe such a tax would have a major impact on tourism spending as only those in the high-income bracket would be affected by it

    “Furthermore, I don’t foresee the government collecting huge sums of revenue from the luxury goods tax

    For one, it has not been introduced yet, so the percentage of the tax is unknown

    But they also have a rebate mechanism such as the Value Added Tax (VAT) in the UK, which allows tourists to reclaim the tax

    He said the tax would increase national revenue

    ['luxury', 'good', 'tax', 'say', 'would']

    03/02/2023, 07:08

    76.92% Shortened!

    Three days after they won the League Cup, Manchester United trailed to Said Benrahma's 54th-minute goal at Old Trafford but an own goal by West Ham's Nayef Aguerd and late strikes from Alejandro Garnacho and Fred sent the hosts into the last eight

    Manchester manager Erik Ten Hag was delighted with his players

    West Ham, who have won only once at Old Trafford in their last 22 visits, took advantage of sloppy defending to open the scoring

    "The performance from all the players was first class and the experienced boys at the back were class too," Sheffield United manager Paul Heckingbottom told the BBC

    It is just a fantastic day," Grimsby manager Paul Hurst told ITV

    Grimsby are only the sixth team from the fourth tier or below to reach the last eight of the FA Cup since the introduction of the division in 1958-59

  • ASK AN ADVISOR: SHOULD I PAY OFF MY MORTGAGE OR INVEST IN CDS? I REFINANCED MY MORTGAGE AT 2.375%, BUT I CAN GET A CD AT 4%. PLUS, I WANT TO RETIRE IN 7 YEARS.

    https://finance.yahoo.com//news/ask-advisor-pay-off-mortgage-151520264.html

    85.37% Shortened!

    I've been debating whether to pay off my mortgage

    (This tool can help match you with potential advisors while you navigate the lead-up to retirement.)   Comparing Your Mortgage Rate to Investment Return Many people like to frame the decision of whether they should pay off their mortgage as a tradeoff between  the interest rate on their mortgage and the return they could earn if they had invested that money instead

    The idea is that if they can earn a higher rate of return than what they pay in interest, they are better off

    That same element of risk isn't present when you pay down a debt balance with a fixed interest rate

    That's because you know the amount that you save – it's that fixed interest rate.  So, the question evolves

    Find a Financial Advisor If you have questions specific to your investing and retirement situation, a financial advisor can help

    ['pay', 'mortgage', 'year', 'advisor', 'retirement']

    I've been debating whether to pay off my mortgage

    (This tool can help match you with potential advisors while you navigate the lead-up to retirement.)   Comparing Your Mortgage Rate to Investment Return Many people like to frame the decision of whether they should pay off their mortgage as a tradeoff between  the interest rate on their mortgage and the return they could earn if they had invested that money instead

    The idea is that if they can earn a higher rate of return than what they pay in interest, they are better off

    That same element of risk isn't present when you pay down a debt balance with a fixed interest rate

    That's because you know the amount that you save – it's that fixed interest rate.  So, the question evolves

    Find a Financial Advisor If you have questions specific to your investing and retirement situation, a financial advisor can help

    ['pay', 'mortgage', 'year', 'advisor', 'retirement']

    https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/21562779/sheffield-united-tottenham-fa-cup-iliman-ndiaye-championship/

    03/02/2023, 06:09

    85.71% Shortened!

    Brazil’s No9 beat the offside trap to race in down the right-hand side of the box, but smashed his shot from an acute angle over the bar

    Fortunately for Spurs, the Malian shanked his shot into the side netting, blowing the best chance of the half

    Conte no doubt will have been screaming at the TV back home, frustrated that his side were not at the races once again in what has been an infuriatingly inconsistent season

  • TONEY ADMITS TO BREAKING BETTING RULES, FACES BAN - SOURCES

    https://www.espn.com/soccer/brentford/story/4890214/brentfords-ivan-toney-admits-to-breaking-fa-betting-rules-could-face-lengthy-ban-sources

    03/02/2023

    50.0% Shortened!

    Brentford striker Ivan Toney has admitted breaking English Football Association (FA) rules relating to betting prior to appearing before a disciplinary panel, sources have told ESPN

    Toney has been charged with a total of 262 breaches between February 2017 and January 2021 when he was a player at Scunthorpe United, Wigan Athletic, Peterborough United and Brentford

    On Wednesday, Toney expressed his concern about the process and criticised the FA over what he perceives to be potential lapses of confidentiality as he prepares to argue his case

    "I was shocked and disappointed to see press speculation yesterday and today about The FA investigation process concerning me after I have been told by The FA that it is a confidential process until any decision has been made," Toney wrote on Instragam

    FA rule E8 states that players "shall not bet, either directly or indirectly, or instruct, permit, cause or enable any person to bet on the result, progress, conduct or any other aspect of, or occurrence in or in connection with, a football match or competition; or any other matter concerning or related to football anywhere in the world, including, for example and without limitation, the transfer of players, employment of managers, team selection or disciplinary matters." Toney could face a substantial ban which could have a major impact on Brentford's season

    Toney was called up to the England squad last September but did not play a single minute and was subsequently left out of Gareth Southgate's final 26-man group for the World Cup finals in November

    ['brentford', 'toney', 'football', 'bet', 'player']

    Brentford striker Ivan Toney has admitted breaking English Football Association (FA) rules relating to betting prior to appearing before a disciplinary panel, sources have told ESPN

    Toney has been charged with a total of 262 breaches between February 2017 and January 2021 when he was a player at Scunthorpe United, Wigan Athletic, Peterborough United and Brentford

    On Wednesday, Toney expressed his concern about the process and criticised the FA over what he perceives to be potential lapses of confidentiality as he prepares to argue his case

    "I was shocked and disappointed to see press speculation yesterday and today about The FA investigation process concerning me after I have been told by The FA that it is a confidential process until any decision has been made," Toney wrote on Instragam

    FA rule E8 states that players "shall not bet, either directly or indirectly, or instruct, permit, cause or enable any person to bet on the result, progress, conduct or any other aspect of, or occurrence in or in connection with, a football match or competition; or any other matter concerning or related to football anywhere in the world, including, for example and without limitation, the transfer of players, employment of managers, team selection or disciplinary matters." Toney could face a substantial ban which could have a major impact on Brentford's season

    Toney was called up to the England squad last September but did not play a single minute and was subsequently left out of Gareth Southgate's final 26-man group for the World Cup finals in November

    ['brentford', 'toney', 'football', 'bet', 'player']

  • LIVERPOOL VS. WOLVERHAMPTON WANDERERS - FOOTBALL MATCH REPORT - MARCH 1, 2023

    https://www.espn.com/soccer/report/_/gameId/638260

    03/02/2023

    70.0% Shortened!

    Virgil van Dijk and forward Mohamed Salah scored second-half goals as Liverpool battled to a 2-0 Premier League home win over Wolverhampton Wanderers on Wednesday to boost their hopes of European football next season

    Liverpool climbed into sixth spot in the table on 39 points, ahead of Fulham on goal difference and with a game in hand, but the home side was forced to work hard on a rainy night at Anfield

    Nunez had the ball in the net for the home side in the 66th minute after a surging run by Diogo Jota, but the Portugal striker was deemed to have fouled Max Kilman in the build-up after a VAR review and the goal was chalked off

    Van Dijk finally broke the deadlock in the 73rd minute, forcing a save with his initial header from a set piece, before Jota put the rebound back across the goal for the Netherlands international to head home from close range

    Klopp's side now face a resurgent Manchester United, who are 10 points ahead of Liverpool in third spot, on Sunday

    "It's a big game anyway, against a team in form

    ['goal', 'liverpool', 'home', 'game', 'minute']

    Virgil van Dijk and forward Mohamed Salah scored second-half goals as Liverpool battled to a 2-0 Premier League home win over Wolverhampton Wanderers on Wednesday to boost their hopes of European football next season

    Liverpool climbed into sixth spot in the table on 39 points, ahead of Fulham on goal difference and with a game in hand, but the home side was forced to work hard on a rainy night at Anfield

    Nunez had the ball in the net for the home side in the 66th minute after a surging run by Diogo Jota, but the Portugal striker was deemed to have fouled Max Kilman in the build-up after a VAR review and the goal was chalked off

    Van Dijk finally broke the deadlock in the 73rd minute, forcing a save with his initial header from a set piece, before Jota put the rebound back across the goal for the Netherlands international to head home from close range

    Klopp's side now face a resurgent Manchester United, who are 10 points ahead of Liverpool in third spot, on Sunday

    "It's a big game anyway, against a team in form

  • AMAZON'S RM25.5 BIL INVESTMENT WILL FURTHER ENHANCE ICT INDUSTRY, HELP SMES, SAYS TENGKU ZAFRUL

    https://www.theedgemarkets.com/node/657553

    03/02/2023

    53.85% Shortened!

    “I have been informed that AWS will eventually have 80% of its workforce made up of Malaysians.  “The partnership between the government and AWS has all the makings of a very promising future supporting Malaysia’s economic development, while also fulfilling the nation’s digital ambitions,” Tengku Zafrul said in his speech at the AWS Malaysia Cloud Day conference here on Thursday (March 2).  AWS announced that it would be opening a new infrastructure region in Malaysia, with an estimated investment value of RM25.5 billion over 15 years

    From January to September 2022, Tengku Zafrul said Malaysia successfully attracted almost RM194 billion worth of approved investments

    “Malaysia already has a reputation as a rising star of the global data centre sector and by having AWS, the world’s leading cloud provider, Malaysia will solidify its position as a data centre hub in the region.  “The investment and initiatives from AWS will provide Malaysia with cutting-edge technologies, providing a competitive edge to local businesses, especially SMEs and MNCs (multi-national corporations), helping them to grow,” he said

    AWS infrastructure region to accelerate Malaysia’s digital adoption

    Malaysia to see greater increase in digital transformation from latest Amazon investment — PM

    RM25.5 bil AWS investment affirms Malaysia’s importance as digital hub of choice, says Fahmi We deliver news to your inbox daily Copyright © 1999-2023 The Edge Communications Sdn

    ['edge', 'malaysia', 'tengku', 'zafrul', 'aws']

    “I have been informed that AWS will eventually have 80% of its workforce made up of Malaysians.  “The partnership between the government and AWS has all the makings of a very promising future supporting Malaysia’s economic development, while also fulfilling the nation’s digital ambitions,” Tengku Zafrul said in his speech at the AWS Malaysia Cloud Day conference here on Thursday (March 2).  AWS announced that it would be opening a new infrastructure region in Malaysia, with an estimated investment value of RM25.5 billion over 15 years

    From January to September 2022, Tengku Zafrul said Malaysia successfully attracted almost RM194 billion worth of approved investments

    “Malaysia already has a reputation as a rising star of the global data centre sector and by having AWS, the world’s leading cloud provider, Malaysia will solidify its position as a data centre hub in the region.  “The investment and initiatives from AWS will provide Malaysia with cutting-edge technologies, providing a competitive edge to local businesses, especially SMEs and MNCs (multi-national corporations), helping them to grow,” he said

    AWS infrastructure region to accelerate Malaysia’s digital adoption

    Malaysia to see greater increase in digital transformation from latest Amazon investment — PM

    RM25.5 bil AWS investment affirms Malaysia’s importance as digital hub of choice, says Fahmi We deliver news to your inbox daily Copyright © 1999-2023 The Edge Communications Sdn

    ['edge', 'malaysia', 'tengku', 'zafrul', 'aws']

    03/02/2023

    71.43% Shortened!

    Thursday, 02 Mar 2023

    "When the rakyat ask me, I tell them how would I know, I don't know," Shahidan said in the Dewan Rakyat on Thursday (March 2)

    On Tuesday (Feb 28), Datuk Seri Dr Wee Ka Siong informed Dewan Rakyat that he had recieved a legal letter from lawyers representing the company improving the chicken eggs from India for speaking on the issue

    During his debate, Dr Wee warned that the government would face a barrage of criticism if the chicken egg shortage was not resolved as Ramadan and Hari Raya Aidilfitri drew near

    The MCA president also brought out three different eggs, one from India, a locally-produced regular egg, and an Omega 3-enriched egg to show their size difference and cost

    The name of the company in question was inadvertently revealed in the letter uploaded by Dr Wee.

    ['know', 'company', 'import', 'egg', 'rakyat']

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/world/2023/03/02/hours-after-deadly-train-crash-greece-agonises-over-what-went-wrong

    03/02/2023, 02:07

    75.0% Shortened!

    A general view of the site of a crash, where two trains collided, near the city of Larissa, Greece, March 1, 2023

    Nearly 24 hours after the two trains collided in central Greece, killing at least 36 people and injuring dozens, survivors and relatives of victims were still in the dark on who was responsible for Greece's deadliest train crash in living memory

    Within hours, Greek police had arrested the station master at a provincial train station, accusing him of death through negligence

    "It's still very early but more than two factors are needed for an accident like this to happen," said Nikos Tsikalakis, head of the workers union' at the Greek railway infrastructure operator OSE, in apparent reference to human error and a technical fault

  • 'MOMMA CAN'T PROTECT YOU': DAVE RAMSEY HAS A BLUNT MESSAGE FOR YOUNG ADULTS STILL LIVING WITH THEIR PARENTS — 3 THINGS YOU NEED TO DO TO GET AHEAD (AND GET YOUR OWN PLACE)

    https://finance.yahoo.com//news/momma-cant-protect-dave-ramsey-110000358.html

    78.12% Shortened!

    More young adults are choosing to live at home with their parents — but many of them are using what they're saving on rent to splurge on designer handbags and expensive jewelry instead

    While the hosts of The Ramsey Show claim these adult children are being “enabled” and “coddled,” many simply can't afford to live on their own in the current economic climate

    There are many practical benefits to living with your parents, but it’s important that you also use this time to work toward your goals, like becoming financially independent

    “The problem is you’ve got debt, you’re not earning enough money and you’re not doing enough to go out and change it

    You may have more room for discretionary spending, but your money could be better spent elsewhere, like investing it in the stock market, even if it’s just a few dollars at a time

    If you're planning to buy instead of rent when you move out, experts generally recommend saving 20% of the home’s purchase price for the down payment, however this can be challenging for many first-timers, especially as home prices have continued to rise

    Chances are good you're overpaying for home insurance

    ['young', 'adult', 'home', 'parent', 'many']

    $1,000 Payments For the typical American, a new car is increasingly out of reach

    Today, about two out of 13 people are making monthly car payments of $1,000 or more

    That helped negative equity plummet earlier in the pandemic

    She researched the life expectancy of her car, and she’s worried she’ll wind up owing on a car that won’t even run

    If they fall further, anyone who bought at the top of the market will fall further into the trap of negative equity
