    The hype came with a dose of reality from Christel Heydemann, boss of French network Orange

    Network operators were in peril, she told the MWC, because “massive network investments of almost 600 billion euros in Europe in the last decade happened to be hard to monetise”

    Terms like “low latency”, “network slicing”, “zero rating” and “massive IoT” are unlikely to get the pulse racing

    “It is a platform for innovation

    Continuing where he left off, Saliba was finally given his chance at Arsenal this season and has not looked back, starting all 24 Premier League games as the Gunners have exceeded all expectations in leading the title race into March

    Saliba's individual transformation has been nothing short of staggering

    The sheer scale of Saliba's improvement is palpably a factor here, given he earns around £40,000 a week currently

    Saliba is entitled to demand a huge hike of his own, commensurate with those around him and his rapidly-growing reputation in the game

  • SURVEY: MORE MALAYSIANS CONCERNED ABOUT ONLINE PRIVACY, SEVEN IN 10 FELT TECH PROGRESS IS 'DESTROYING LIVES'

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2023/03/01/survey-more-malaysians-concerned-about-online-privacy-seven-in-10-felt-tech-progress-is-destroying-lives/57291

    03/01/2023, 08:09

    57.14% Shortened!

    "While concerns about data privacy and Big Tech remain strong, data apathy continues to grow, with citizens recognising that some loss of privacy is inevitable

    "An implicit belief in the power of technology to do good and improve lives is part of the privacy trade-off,” it commented

    However, 70 per cent also feared that technological progress would come at the cost of destroying their lives

    The recognition of the role technology plays in daily life has remained high with a high proportion of respondents consistently indicating that they cannot imagine life without the internet, Ipsos said, adding that this number has increased slightly in some countries

    "However, over the same period there has been a significant increase in people who feel that we have lost something along the way, that technology, while hugely powerful, is undermining our way of life to some extent,” it added

    On the other hand, only 15 per cent of those aged between 55 and 74 felt that way

    ['privacy', 'technology', 'respondent', 'per', 'cent']

    03/01/2023, 08:09

    76.0% Shortened!

    “I started a food business in early 2020 and had to take a business loan

    “At that time, I also had to pay off my car loan on top of the business loan, which led to me declaring bankruptcy

    This was a bitter pill to swallow as I had to care for my family at the same time,” said the father of two

    “I am grateful for this fresh start

    “At least now, I can move on from this episode and repay my loved ones for the support they have shown me every step of the way,” said the 38-year-old who was declared bankrupt last year

    The 54-year-old said he would now politely decline requests to be a guarantor, even if they were from close friends

  • GLOBAL SCAM RING TAKEN DOWN

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2023/03/01/global-scam-ring-taken-down

    03/01/2023, 08:09

    74.07% Shortened!

    The MACC’s Anti Money Laundering (AML) task force conducted the raid, which was led by MACC deputy commissioner Datuk Mohamad Zamri Zainul Abidin, at about 12.15pm yesterday following the success of Op Tropicana last week

    “Investigations showed the syndicate was in the middle of recruiting staff before it could operate (the new hub)

    “The syndicate used money changers to transfer money overseas

    “We are not ruling out the possibility that the syndicate used money changers to bring in money as well,” the source said

    “There is a possibility that the syndicate would have targeted local victims,” the source said

    It is believed that the office would have been operational in two to three months and expected to be a hub for all other scam call centres in the country

    The AML task force also raided two money changers in Kuala Lumpur

    ['macc', 'raid', 'syndicate', 'office', 'money']

  • CHINA'S ABRUPT REOPENING SPARKS STUDENT ACCOMMODATION CRISIS IN AUSTRALIA

    https://www.channelnewsasia.com/asia/china-australia-university-student-accommodation-housing-rents-covid-19-border-3313731

    03/01/2023, 08:08

    80.65% Shortened!

    "It's a perfect storm." The shortage has meanwhile jumpstarted one of the few subsets of Australian residential property, the student accommodation sector, that languished during COVID-19

    Tomas Johnsson, CEO of UniLodge Australia, the country's biggest operator of purpose-built student accommodation, said some developers were even paying more to speed up construction

    Highlighting the rush for accommodation, Louis Liu, 22, a Chinese student in Brisbane, and others have started attending property viewings on behalf of students on the mainland

    They rose about 10 per cent last year

    Sydney real estate agent Joe Du said he rented a one-bedroom apartment to the mother of a Chinese student for A$1,050 per week, about 40 per cent more than the next most expensive one-bedroom apartment in the neighbourhood

    "She was in a big rush."

    ['student', 'accommodation', 'say', 'australia', 'chinese']

    Earlier, Najib’s lead counsel Tan Sri Muhammad Shafee Abdullah told the court that Datuk Zamani Ibrahim, the husband of Chief Justice Tengku Maimun Tuan Mat, made a “public declaration of hatred” against his client Najib with a Facebook post four years ago

  • RAISE INDIVIDUAL TAX RELIEF TO RM12,000, SAYS WEE

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2023/03/01/raise-individual-tax-relief-to-rm12000-says-wee

    03/01/2023, 08:08

    60.0% Shortened!

    Dr Wee, who is MCA president, also suggested gradually increasing the proposed RM12,000 individual relief to RM15,000 in three years

    “This will help Malaysians, particularly the B40 and M40, who are affected by inflation,” he added

    “These two steps are more effective in helping the M40, particularly those affected by the rising inflation,” he added

    Dr Wee commended the government for allocating RM1bil in Budget 2023 to provide RM500 to each of the two million Employees Provident Fund (EPF) aged 40 to 54 who have less than RM10,000 in their Account 1

    He said he was concerned that there were two million people in this age group who had less than RM10,000 in their EPF

    Dr Wee said the government must accurately identify “target groups” in its plans to give the RM500 EPF contribution

    “In addition, the RM500 contribution should not include inactive EPF members, as they may no longer reside in Malaysia or they may be a permanent resident, who should not be accepting the contribution.”

    Thank you for your report! Copyright © 1995-

    ['relief', 'say', 'wee', 'rm10', 'two']

    He said he was concerned that there were two million people in this age group who had less than RM10,000 in their EPF

    “In addition, the RM500 contribution should not include inactive EPF members, as they may no longer reside in Malaysia or they may be a permanent resident, who should not be accepting the contribution.”

    With Malaysia hosting an estimated 158,000 refugees from Myanmar, Anwar is under domestic pressure to address the situation.  Anwar also used the trip to refloat a proposal for an Asia Monetary Fund (AMF), which was first proposed by Japan during the 1997 Asian Financial Crisis

    Washington and its allies would be wise to engage Anwar early at the highest levels

    As long as Anwar can deftly navigate his tricky domestic political situation, he may very well be able to lead Malaysia and the region when Kuala Lumpur is scheduled to chair ASEAN in 2025

    Keeping the Georgian talent for at least another year would reset his costs in Napoli's financial statements and allow the club to get 100 per cent of the capital gain

    Kvara in full flight during Napoli's most recent outing, a 2-0 victory away to Empoli in Serie A And now, Napoli are desperate to tie him down to a new long-term deal

    According to Gazzetta dello Sport, Napoli are wanting to double Kvara's current salary to keep him at the club and extend his contract for at least five years

    It is difficult to imagine how Napoli could turn down £105m for a player who cost just £8m in June 2022

    03/01/2023, 06:08

    A former Australia national-team player, Dodd also recalled recent speculation FIFA could sign the Saudi Arabia tourism board as an official sponsor of the month-long tournament that starts July 20

    First FIFA wants to send an LGBTQ-friendly audience to 'Visit Saudi'," Dodd wrote

    "She lives and breathes 'futebol' and that is also why she can be an excellent link between FIFA and fans worldwide." FIFA noted Lima is a "supermodel, actress and businesswoman" but offered no details about her links to the sport besides being a fan

    Infantino and Dodd served together on FIFA's ruling committee for more than a year after he was elected in 2016

    She was the first woman, in 2013, to represent the Asian soccer confederation at FIFA and gained a reputation as an independent voice during the presidency of Sepp Blatter

    She suggested that FIFA asking LGBTQ players and fans to visit Saudi Arabia was "to send them to a jurisdiction where they are regarded as criminals." Dodd also wrote then she was "thrilled by the progress women's football has made there [in Saudi Arabia] in recent times." The pending "Visit Saudi" sponsor deal also provoked the soccer federations of Australia and New Zealand to urge FIFA not to sign the agreement.

  • FRANCE, WORLD CUP LEGEND JUST FONTAINE DIES AGED 89

    https://www.espn.co.uk/football/france-fra/story/4889970/franceworld-cup-legend-just-fontaine-dies-aged-89

    03/01/2023

    58.82% Shortened!

    Former France forward Just Fontaine, who scored a record 13 goals in a single World Cup, has died, his former club Stade de Reims said on Wednesday

    Fontaine netted 30 goals from 21 caps for France between 1953 and 1960

    Entering the tournament, the Morocco-born Fontaine was a little-known forward outside of the French league

    "A star of French football, an outstanding striker, a legendary Reims player ..

    Stade de Reims send their most sincere condolences," Reims said on Twitter

    "A thought for Just Fontaine," French champions Paris Saint-Germain said on Twitter

    As a coach, Fontaine helped PSG gain promotion to the first division in 1974

    ['reach', 'france', 'fontaine', 'goal', 'cup']

    Steve Nicol thinks Arteta's Arsenal fully deserve the 1-0 win at Leicester in the Premier League

    Saliba was reported to have suffered personal issues, including family bereavement, during this period and by the time he was sent on loan once more for the 2021-22 season, this time to Marseille, his career at Arsenal looked over before it began

    Continuing where he left off, Saliba was finally given his chance at Arsenal this season and has not looked back, starting all 24 Premier League games as the Gunners have exceeded all expectations in leading the title race into March

    Saliba's individual transformation has been nothing short of staggering

    The sheer scale of Saliba's improvement is palpably a factor here, given he earns around £40,000 a week currently

    Saliba is entitled to demand a huge hike of his own, commensurate with those around him and his rapidly-growing reputation in the game

    JAKARTA, March 1 (Reuters) - Indonesia's President Joko Widodo on Wednesday launched the construction of a $2.6 billion hydropower plant that would be linked to a planned industrial park in North Kalimantan

    The power plant, called Mentarang Induk, is being developed by PT Kayan Hydropower Nusantara, a joint venture between Indonesian companies PT Adaro Energy Indonesia and PT Kayan Patria Pratama Group, and Malaysia's Sarawak Energy Bhd

  • FEDERAL GOVT LOOKING AT REINTRODUCING PENANG FERRY SERVICES FOR VEHICLES

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2023/03/01/federal-govt-looking-at-reintroducing-penang-ferry-services-for-vehicles

    03/01/2023

    68.42% Shortened!

    Transport Minister Anthony Loke said it would not be viable to bring back the service immediately as the current ferry terminal had been renovated and refurbished to cater to the new ferries

    He said since the current ferry terminals have been renovated to cater to the new ferries, it would not be able to serve cars as it can only serve pedestrians and motorcycles

    Loke said in terms of the iconic ferry terminal, the federal government had plans to bring it back, but the shape and form would have to be further discussed with the stakeholders

    He said talks are on going with Penang Port Commission to reintroduce the old ferry service for tourism, transport or as a floating museum but no decision has been made yet

    On new ferries, Loke said the new ferry services will be available on 1st August 2023

    He also expected to visit the ferry terminal in the island and mainland, the railway station before going back to Kuala Lumpur using KTM commuter.

    ['ferry', 'service', 'loke', 'say', 'would']

    He said talks are on going with Penang Port Commission to reintroduce the old ferry service for tourism, transport or as a floating museum but no decision has been made yet

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2023/03/01/after-perikatan-claims-conflict-mb-says-only-representing-selangor-in-sustainability-project/57467

    03/01/2023

    60.0% Shortened!

    About Us Advertise KUALA LUMPUR, March 1 — Selangor Menteri Besar Datuk Seri Amirudin Shari said today that his presence in an environmental sustainability company that has dealings with his state was not a conflict of interests

    Instead, he said his position in the company was to safeguard the interests of the state government

    “If you understand the chronology, as mentioned in the LLSB’s (Landasan Lumayan Sdn Bhd) statement earlier, I represent the state government and I want to ensure that the state’s interests is not interfered with, including revenues

    “It’s a state subsidiary company, not a private company, not individually owned,” the MB reiterated

    “I come as a representative of the state government and there are all kinds of RFPs, a combination of sorts, because with the state government, there are full ownership and partial ownership, and I represent 45 per cent which is there, and not any other interests

    “So, I don't think there is any conflict of interest

    ['selangor', 'amirudin', 'say', 'today', 'company']

    About Us Advertise KUALA LUMPUR, March 1 — Selangor Menteri Besar Datuk Seri Amirudin Shari said today that his presence in an environmental sustainability company that has dealings with his state was not a conflict of interests

    Instead, he said his position in the company was to safeguard the interests of the state government

    “If you understand the chronology, as mentioned in the LLSB’s (Landasan Lumayan Sdn Bhd) statement earlier, I represent the state government and I want to ensure that the state’s interests is not interfered with, including revenues

    “It’s a state subsidiary company, not a private company, not individually owned,” the MB reiterated

    “I come as a representative of the state government and there are all kinds of RFPs, a combination of sorts, because with the state government, there are full ownership and partial ownership, and I represent 45 per cent which is there, and not any other interests

    “So, I don't think there is any conflict of interest

  • WALL ST INDEXES MIXED, TREASURY YIELDS TICK UP AS HIGHER RATES LOOM

    https://www.reuters.com/markets/global-markets-wrapup-1-2023-02-28/

    03/01/2023, 04:08

    87.5% Shortened!

    The pan-European STOXX 600 (.STOXX) index fell 0.3%, still up 1.74% in February, its fourth positive month in five

    and euro area economic data has reinforced the view that interest rates will rise further and stay high for longer

    This is their largest monthly rise for the month of February since 1981, according to Refinitiv data

    Fed funds futures are fully pricing in a 25-bps rate rise from the Fed next month, with around a 20% chance of a larger 50-bps hike

    In Europe, two-year German bond yields are heading for their largest monthly rise for the month of February since 1991, while two-year UK gilts are heading for their biggest February rise since 2005

    10-year yield rose 1.6 bps to 3.938%, up more than 50 bps in February, its biggest monthly jump since September

    ['february', 'reuters', 'month', 'rate', 'data']

  • FINLAND SINKS INTO RECESSION

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/world/2023/03/01/finland-sinks-into-recession

    03/01/2023, 02:08

    68.42% Shortened!

    28 (Xinhua) -- Despite Finland's gross domestic product (GDP) increased by 2 percent year-on-year in 2022, Statistics Finland said on Tuesday that the country has entered a recession, as GDP change was negative during the last two quarters of the year

    Finland is in recession in light of these data," Samu Hakala, head of Statistics Finland, said on Tuesday

    GDP decreased by 0.1 percent in the thrid quarter and by 0.6 percent in the fourth quarter from the previous quarters respectively

    In the fourth quarter of 2022, private consumption decreased by 0.6 percent from the previous quarter, while government consumption expenditure decreased by 1.2 percent

    Meanwhile, investment decreased by 2.0 percent

    In the whole of 2022, the volume of exports grew by 1.5 percent and that of imports by 7.4 percent, and investment increased by 5.8 percent

    ['finland', 'gdp', 'percent', 'year', 'say']

    28 (Xinhua) -- Despite Finland's gross domestic product (GDP) increased by 2 percent year-on-year in 2022, Statistics Finland said on Tuesday that the country has entered a recession, as GDP change was negative during the last two quarters of the year

    Finland is in recession in light of these data," Samu Hakala, head of Statistics Finland, said on Tuesday

    GDP decreased by 0.1 percent in the thrid quarter and by 0.6 percent in the fourth quarter from the previous quarters respectively

    In the fourth quarter of 2022, private consumption decreased by 0.6 percent from the previous quarter, while government consumption expenditure decreased by 1.2 percent

    Meanwhile, investment decreased by 2.0 percent

    In the whole of 2022, the volume of exports grew by 1.5 percent and that of imports by 7.4 percent, and investment increased by 5.8 percent

    The bank hired well-known law firm Dechert, which advised JPMorgan Chase on the Frank acquisition

    Sidley Austin represented Frank, according to the Javice court filing

    Javice cited several reasons she thought JPMorgan was motivated to close the Frank acquisition

    JPMorgan Chase scooped up Frank for $175 million, a low price for a company that at least claimed to have a 25% market share of the student market

    If Frank really did have more than 4 million registered student accounts that JPMorgan Chase said it believed it had, then the bank should’ve paid more than $175 million, the filing said

  • ASK AN ADVISOR: WE ARE 70 YEARS OLD, HAVE $99K IN RETIREMENT INCOME, A $1.4M IRA AND OTHER INVESTMENTS. IS IT TOO LATE TO CONVERT TO A ROTH?

    https://finance.yahoo.com//news/ask-advisor-70-years-old-202905223.html

    89.09% Shortened!

    Our Roth is worth $400,000

    There is no age cap on your ability to convert to a Roth

    There is also no earned income requirement to convert to a Roth

    A financial advisor may help you understand how to manage the tax repercussions of a Roth conversion

    Roth conversions make the most sense when you can choose to pay the income tax on your IRA balance and move it to a Roth in a relatively low-income tax year

    Other Tax Implications Federal income tax gets all the attention when Roth conversions come up

    ['income', 'ira', 'roth', 'convert', 'conversion']

  • YOUR REQUIRED MINIMUM DISTRIBUTIONS (RMDS) HAVE OFFICIALLY BEEN PUSHED BACK

    https://finance.yahoo.com//news/required-minimum-distributions-rmds-officially-164735072.html

    80.0% Shortened!

    What Are RMDs? You don’t pay taxes on the money in your IRA or 401(k) when you put it in, which is why these accounts are considered tax-advantaged retirement accounts

    The money will be taxed according to your current tax bracket in retirement

    This is beneficial if you are in a lower tax bracket in retirement than you were when you first earned the money

    Before the SECURE 2.0 Act, or the Securing a Strong Retirement Act, was signed into law, you had to take RMDs following the year you turn 72 or 70.5 if you were born before July 1, 1949

    Bottom Line The SECURE 2.0 Act gives your tax-advantaged account more time to grow tax free before you have to withdraw money and, therefore, pay taxes on that money

    Tips on Retirement A financial advisor can offer insight and guidance as you make financial decisions during retirement or as you prepare for retirement

    ['tax', 'retirement', 'account', 'take', 'rmds']

    What Are RMDs? You don’t pay taxes on the money in your IRA or 401(k) when you put it in, which is why these accounts are considered tax-advantaged retirement accounts

    The money will be taxed according to your current tax bracket in retirement

    This is beneficial if you are in a lower tax bracket in retirement than you were when you first earned the money

    Before the SECURE 2.0 Act, or the Securing a Strong Retirement Act, was signed into law, you had to take RMDs following the year you turn 72 or 70.5 if you were born before July 1, 1949

    Bottom Line The SECURE 2.0 Act gives your tax-advantaged account more time to grow tax free before you have to withdraw money and, therefore, pay taxes on that money

    Tips on Retirement A financial advisor can offer insight and guidance as you make financial decisions during retirement or as you prepare for retirement

    ['tax', 'retirement', 'account', 'take', 'rmds']



  • WHY BIDEN IS PROMISING TO VETO BILL TO ABOLISH THE IRS AND INTRODUCE ONE NATIONAL TAX RATE IF IT PASSES

    https://finance.yahoo.com//news/congress-vote-whether-abolish-irs-163355705.html

    91.78% Shortened!

    tax code is very straightforward

    As written, the Fair Tax Act is misleading

    As a result, while the Fair Tax Act as written proposes a 23% inclusive tax, it would be a 30% tax in the way that virtually all taxpayers calculate sales taxes

    One study from 2011 found that the results of a 30% sales tax, as proposed under the Fair Tax Act, would shift the nation’s tax burden overwhelmingly

    Virtually all tax experts to study the issue agree that it would complicate the tax code and act as a massive tax cut for the wealthy

    Tips on Taxes The Fair Tax Act proposes a sweeping new sales tax

    ['would', 'fair', 'tax', 'act', 'income']

  • AUSTRALIA ‘BLOCKS’ RUSSIA & CHINA FROM ITS AVALON AIR SHOW; BAE UNVEILS NEW ‘100 KG’ STRIX VTOL UNCREWED AIR SYSTEM

    https://eurasiantimes.com/australia-blocks-russia-bae-unveils-new-100-kg-strix-vtol-uncrewed-air-system/

    03/01/2023

    64.71% Shortened!

    Australia’s Avalon International Air Show, which began April 28, exhibits a wide range of new defense technologies, including a new Australian-made lethal drone

    Unmanned aerial technology is already establishing itself as a major air show theme

    Designed to be transported in shipping containers, the uncrewed air system was created by BAE Systems Australia

    The designers of this UAV believe that the deadly drone may be produced locally within three years.  The STRIX, developed by BAE Systems and Perth-based Innovaero, is Australia’s first domestically designed, manufactured, and armed VTOL (vertical take-off and landing) uncrewed air system (UAS), according to the company.  The firm said that the partnership merges Innovaero’s experience in designing and manufacturing aerospace products for the Australian market with BAE Systems’ expertise in autonomous platforms and its vehicle management system (VMS) technology

    The RAZER precision-guided munition transforms a normal non-guided munition weighing 40 to 50 kg into a low-cost, high-precision air-launched weapon

    Another Australian-designed uncrewed system, called MQ-28A ‘Ghost Bat,’ was publicly unveiled during the 2019 Avalon Airshow after being discreetly developed by aerospace giant Boeing in cooperation with the RAAF and the Defense Department.

    ['australia', 'air', 'australian', 'also', 'design']

    A PMI reading above 50 indicates expansion, while a reading below 50 signals contraction in growth

    – Jihye Lee March is most often a positive month for the stock market, but this year it may bring more of the same turbulence that rattled investors in February

  • BIDEN CONDITIONS FOR CHIP FUNDING CAUSE ‘HEARTBURN,’ INDUSTRY INSIDERS SAY

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/money/2023/03/01/biden-conditions-for-chip-funding-cause-heartburn-industry-insiders-say/57358

    03/01/2023

    64.71% Shortened!

    Industry sources say that the measure was a surprise and that it is unclear how it would be applied to companies, each of which will have to negotiate separate agreements with the US government

    “If that’s a precursor to more and deeper things (government officials) would be looking for in a negotiation stage, there’s some criticism there that it could make it more challenging to do things,” one semiconductor industry source told Reuters, requesting anonymity because of the sensitivity of the matter

    Share repurchases have helped keep investors happy during tumultuous market conditions in the chip industry, which have swung from shortage to glut in two years

    “I believe this is going to cause heartburn for companies,” a second chip industry executive told Reuters, requesting anonymity to discuss sensitive matters

    “It’s pretty odd for a foreign company to accept this kind of meddling in its business,” said a third chip industry source

    For chip companies that already planned on offering child care to their factory workers, the additional requirements to offer similar benefits to construction workers building new plants are “a bit of a distraction, but it’s all manageable,” according to the first industry source

    ['industry', 'source', 'say', 'chip', 'company']

    Industry sources say that the measure was a surprise and that it is unclear how it would be applied to companies, each of which will have to negotiate separate agreements with the US government

    “If that’s a precursor to more and deeper things (government officials) would be looking for in a negotiation stage, there’s some criticism there that it could make it more challenging to do things,” one semiconductor industry source told Reuters, requesting anonymity because of the sensitivity of the matter

    Share repurchases have helped keep investors happy during tumultuous market conditions in the chip industry, which have swung from shortage to glut in two years

    “I believe this is going to cause heartburn for companies,” a second chip industry executive told Reuters, requesting anonymity to discuss sensitive matters

    “It’s pretty odd for a foreign company to accept this kind of meddling in its business,” said a third chip industry source

  • MUSK WARNED ABOUT LAB LEAK TWEETS BY CHINA STATE MEDIA COLUMNIST

    https://www.thestar.com.my/aseanplus/aseanplus-news/2023/03/01/musk-warned-about-lab-leak-tweets-by-china-state-media-columnist

    03/01/2023

    73.91% Shortened!

    Elon Musk has long benefited from his close ties to Beijing

    The columnist was referring to Musk’s response to a tweet that alleged Anthony Fauci, the former chief medical adviser to the US President, funded research at a lab in Wuhan, once Covid’s epicentre

    The Global Times warned Musk against pushing the Covid lab leak theory, asking Musk if he was "breaking the pot of China?” - a reference to a Chinese idiom similar in meaning to biting the hand that feeds you

    China has long hit back at any suggestion that Covid was leaked either accidentally or deliberately from a high-security lab at the Wuhan Institute of Virology

    Musk’s time operating in China hasn’t been entirely smooth

    Musk tweets are often controversial

    ['musk', 'china', 'covid', 'leak', 'lab']

  • MALAYSIA'S PMI READING HITS HIGHEST FOUR MONTHS

    https://www.thestar.com.my/business/business-news/2023/03/01/malaysias-pmi-reading-hits-highest-four-months

    03/01/2023

    75.0% Shortened!

    S&P Global said the relative improvement in the data from the January survey suggests that official numbers for GDP and manufacturing production will continue to show year-on-year expansions, following slowdowns in the rates of growth shown by recent official data releases

    “Signs of improvement in sector performance were evident with regards to both output and new orders in February, which both moderated to a much lesser extent than in January,” it said

    “While the rate of input cost inflation ticked up to a three-month high in February, the latest increase was still relatively modest and much softer than seen on average during 2022

    Similarly, output price inflation was marginal for the second month running,” it said.

    Report it to us

    Thank you for your report! Copyright © 1995-

    ['global', 'february', 'january', 'post', 'month']

    S&P Global said the relative improvement in the data from the January survey suggests that official numbers for GDP and manufacturing production will continue to show year-on-year expansions, following slowdowns in the rates of growth shown by recent official data releases

    “Signs of improvement in sector performance were evident with regards to both output and new orders in February, which both moderated to a much lesser extent than in January,” it said

    “While the rate of input cost inflation ticked up to a three-month high in February, the latest increase was still relatively modest and much softer than seen on average during 2022

    Similarly, output price inflation was marginal for the second month running,” it said.
